name: Whey Concentrate 2.2kg
description:
VyoMax Whey Concentrate has been carefully formulated to create a great tasting protein with a high BV (Biological Value). The protein has been synthesised with glutamine peptides to encourage muscle recovery. Whey protein is about the purest form of protein available making it a must-have product for bodybuilders, athletes, and individuals looking to boost their daily protein intake.

Production:
VyoMax Whey Concentrate  is made through the delicate process of micro-filtration. This allows for greater protein synthesis and the preservation of essential amino acids. 

VyoMax Whey Concentrate  can be used by anyone looking for a high quality, great tasting protein supplement to use in conjunction with a training routine or those individuals wanting to boost their daily protein intake to meet dietary requirements.
 
Key benefits of VyoMax Whey Concentrate :

• High in protein

• Low in carbohydrates and fat

• Balanced with glutamine peptides to encourage muscle recovery

• Great for building lean muscle

• No aspartame or acesulfame K

• High in protein

name: Milk & Egg Protein 2.5kg
description:
VyoMax Milk, Egg & Whey Protein Powder contains the right balance of branched chain amino acids (BCAA’s) ensuring a 2:1:1 ratio of Leucine, Isoleucine, and Valine.

These amino acids constitute approximately 35% of the amino acid content of the muscle tissue in the human body.

The higher amount of leucine reflects its importance in muscle metabolism as the most effective branch chain amino acid required for energy.

However, each of these amino acids play an important role in protein synthesis and are used by the body for energy, to promote muscle growth, restore nitrogen retention and encourage recovery

• Encourages muscle growth & prevents muscle breakdown

• Increases muscle recovery time

• Contains essential amino acids

• Tastes great and mixes easily

name: Pure Protein GF-1  2.2kg
description:
USN’s Pure Protein GF-1 is a protein blend consisting of a precise mixture of different protein sources. Protein is the structural core of the human body and is at work in every single cell. Protein performs many essential functions in the body. It is required for growth and repair of tissues.

The quality of a protein is determined by its amino acid profile. Milk and high-quality soy, combine essential and nonessential amino acids (protein building blocks) to support muscle growth and maintenance.

USN’s Pure Protein GF-1 provides an excellent source of protein which the body can use to build and maintain muscle tissue during and after intense physical activity. This scientifically engineered formula is a must for any athlete, body-builder or individual. Pure Protein is a great tasting shake and mixes easily.

Who should use it:

• Any person who needs a high quality, balanced protein shake

• It’s ideal for active people following a low carb eating plan
 
Core benefits of Pure Protein GF-1:

• Protein contributes to the growth & maintenance of muscle mass

• Pantothenic acid supports normal synthesis and metabolism of steroid hormones, vitamin D and some neurotransmitters

• Pantothenic acid also contributes to normal mental performance and a reduction in tiredness and fatigue

• Magnesium contributes to normal protein synthesis & the maintenance of normal muscle function

• Folic acid also supports normal amino acid synthesis and functioning of the immune system

• Niacin contributes to normal energy-yielding metabolism

• Contains Tolerase pH-stable lactase. Lactase enzyme improves lactose digestion in individuals who have difficulty digesting lactose

name: Premium 8hr Casein
description:
USN Premium 8 Hr Casein a precise time release protein drink engineered for prolonged amino acid uptake and muscle protection.
 
USN Premium 8 Hr Casein contains pure spray-dried calcium caseinate and Aminogen. It supports rapid, complete muscle recovery and is scientifically formulated to ensure an optimal, steady amino acid release into the body, without any bloating effects.  Unlike whey, which is absorbed quickly in the body, calcium caseinate is an insoluble, slow digesting, milk-derived protein. Calcium caseinate can take up to four hours to digest. This makes calcium caseinate an excellent choice of protein right before bedtime, since it offers a slow, steady synthesis of aminos, promoting muscle mass. It has also been shown to be anti-catabolic.  Aminogen is a patented, designer enzyme which breaks down protein and improves amino acid absorption. A natural, plant-derived enzyme, Aminogen is ideal for increasing lean body mass and strength and promoting deep muscle recovery. It has been shown to increase Branched Chain Amino Acid (BCAA) absorption specifically, as well as nitrogen retention. Aminogen does all this while supporting protein digestion and reducing or eliminating the gas, bloating and constipation protein can sometimes cause.
 
Who should use it?

Any person who needs a high quality, balanced protein shake.

Developed for athletes & bodybuilders who want to build lean muscle.

It’s ideal for active people following a low carb eating plan.

• Prolong controlled nitrogen molecule release

• Slow digesting protein suitable for between meals and during the sleeping phase

• Constant flow of amino acids through your blood stream long after ingestion

• Eliminates a catabolic environment

• Maximum amino acid absorption

name: Muscle Fuel STS 5kg
description:
USN's Muscle Fuel is an advanced engineered meal replacement formula that is designed for active people who demand the benefits of top quality proteins, complex carbohydrates, and nutrients for optimum health and muscle performance. Studies suggest that using a variety of protein substrates may work best for improving protein synthesis and overall health. Unlike other meal replacement formulas, USN's Muscle Fuel is low in sugar and also offers a variety of anti-catabolic amino acids. This unique formula combines high biological value proteins with a very low glycemic index carbohydrate to build and repair muscle tissue while balancing nitrogen levels during workouts.

Just enough carbohydrates are used to fuel your workout, replenish depleted glycogen and push your metabolism into hyper drive. It is designed to pack muscle on even the hardest of the hard gainers with optimal protein-to-carb ratio and a level of quality protein that guarantees an anabolic environment for muscle growth and performance. USN's Muscle Fuel is a complete meal that is very low in fat, great tasting and easily digestible.

• Quality Protein from 4 premium sources (Total 44,000mg amino acids)

• Advanced time release system for sustained protein uptake

• High protein formula including Micellar Casein and WPC

name: Pure L-Glutamine
description:
Glutamine is an amino acid. During intense training, your muscle L-Glutamine levels drop sharply. This, in turn decreases strength, stamina and recovery. Research demonstrates that following a rigorous workout, it may take up to six days for L-Glutamine levels to return to normal without supplementation. Without adequate levels of L-Glutamine, it is impossible for protein synthesis to occur.

L-Glutamine also increases cell volumization immediately. Volumized muscle cells appear larger, get a better pump and assist in protein synthesis. In fact, L-Glutamine helps muscle cells to utilize both protein and carbohydrates. L-Glutamine also acts as a powerful ammonia scavenger. Ammonia is a highly toxic substance to muscle cells.

Finally, L-Glutamine increases the body's ability to secrete Human Growth Hormone (HGH). HGH assists in metabolising body fat and helps to support new muscle tissue growth. Research demonstrates that the muscles can benefit from a minimum of 2 to 5 additional grams of L-Glutamine daily.

name: Hyperbolic Mass 6kg
description:
USN Hyperbolic Mass has been scientifically formulated for individuals with a fast metabolism who demand a high level of energy from quality protein and carbohydrates to prevent the breakdown of muscle tissue for energy.

The 50g Anabolic Protein Matrix contains high levels of natural Branched Chain Amino Acids (BCAA’s) and glutamine. Perhaps among the most beneficial and effective supplements in any sports nutrition program are the BCAA’s, leucine, isoleucine and valine. The combination of these three essential amino acids make up approximately 1/3 of skeletal muscle in the human body, and play an important role in protein synthesis, and thus muscle growth and repair.

The HyperBolic Hard-gainer stack provides a wide array of other potential muscle-enhancing ingredients like amino acids, ß-alanine, HMB, natural testosterone optimizers, as well as different creatine forms.
 
HyperBolic Mass has been scientifically designed to help you achieve your calorie intake and muscle-building goals. It provides many positive attributes all delivered in a compact, tasty drink.

name: HMB 1000 120ct
description:
Beta-hydroxy-beta methylbutyrate (HMB) is a by-product or metabolite of the essential amino acid, Leucine. HMB is produced in our body from the proteins in our diet and is also consumed in small amounts from the foods we eat. However, only a small amount (roughly 5%) of the Leucine you eat is converted into HMB. For the production of HMB to reach optimal gram quantities per day, you’ll need 20-50 grams of Leucine. Consequently, getting enough HMB from your diet alone is virtually impossible.

Research has shown that supplementing with 3g of HMB per day helps to slow down a process called proteolysis, the natural process of breaking down muscle tissue that occurs after intense physical activity (eg weight training) taking HMB gives the body a head start with muscle recovery by minimising the amount of muscle breakdown and protein degradation after exercise. This means that your body stays in an anabolic state for longer, allowing for more muscle growth. HMB basically enhances the effects of exercise on muscle size and strength.

Container Size: 120 Capsules 
Serving Size: 2 Capsules 
Servings Per Container: 60 

Amount Per Serving: 
HMB (Calcium beta-hydroxy-beta-methylbutyrate monohydrate): 1000mg 
Other Ingredients: 

Gelatin (capsule) microcrystalline cellulose, silicium dioxide, magnesium stearate
As a dietary supplement take 2 capsules 3 times daily with meals.

name: Creatine Anabolic 1.8kg
description:
Creatine Anabolic makes use of the ‘Ultra-4 Stack’ of advanced forms of creatine. It is a scientific formulation that combines pure creatine monohydrate (laboratory tested HPLC 99.9% pure creatine), Creatine Ethyl Ester, Tri-Creatine Malate, and Creatine Pyroglutamate with dextrose, a high glycemic index (GI) carbohydrate, which causes an insulin spike with the goal of making more creatine and glucose available to muscle cells much faster. Creatine Anabolic’s Insuloforce blend contains a variety of alleged ‘insulin mimetics’ – compounds that actually mimic the action of insulin. Among the most powerful of these insulin optimizers is Alpha-Lipoic Acid (ALA), which may improve creatine uptake by the muscle cells.

The Myoforce Matrix blend delivers a powerful blow of Beta Alanine, Taurine, Glycine, HMB and several forms of the anabolic amino acid Glutamine, in an attempt to further enhance the product’s muscle-building effects. Creatine Anabolic not only builds muscle and cranks up strength, it also supports glycogen synthesis.

• Multi-creatine formula ‘Ultra-4 Stack’

• Dextrose & waxy Maize for insulin and glycogen stimulation

• With lipoic acid, beta alanine, taurine & glycine

name: CLA Ultralean 1000
description:
Conjugated Linoleic Acid (CLA) is an essential Fatty Acid with a number of fat-burning effects. Research has shown CLA to enhance fat loss whilst preserving lean muscle. The potential beneficial effects of CLA on human health have been widely investigated and proven effective in weight management. Several studies have demonstrated that CLA can positively affect body mass and has a beneficial effect on lean muscle mass. CLA also increases the activity of hormone sensitive lipases, which result in the breakdown of stored fat. As CLA makes more fat available for energy the body is able to spare glycogen and therefore enhance endurance performance.

USN's CLA 1000 contains the highest concentration of the two active CLA isomers, c9, t11 and tc10, c12. Both have been identified as being helpful in reducing body fat and increasing lean muscle mass. It is sources from natural safflower oil and each batch is laboratory tested to be pure and free from impurities.

Tocopherols 250ppm 

Ingredients: 

UltraLean Conjugated linoleic acid from safflower oil, tocopherols 250ppm. 80% CLA providing C9, T11 and T12 isomes in a 50:50 ratio 

Take 1 to 2 soft gels, two to three times a day with or after meals.

name: CLA Green Tea
description:
USN CLA is now fortified with Epigallocatechin Gallate (EGCG) from Green Tea to offer a new product, CLA Green Tea. EGCG is well known for its antioxidant properties, its ability to break down fat, as well as its blood sugar regulating abilities.

Conjugated Linoleic Acid with Green Tea Extract is seen as a "wonder nutrient" that occurs naturally in a wide variety of foods such as beef, some dairy products and turkey. In the modern diet there is just enough CLA for the actual purpose. According to the latest scientific research, CLA inhibits the body's mechanism for storing fat and causes the body to burn stored fat for energy. This "wonder nutrient" has also been shown to inhibit the process that is responsible for the deposition of fat in the body.

CLA directs the body to use fat reserves for energy. It has been shown to increase lean muscle while reducing body fat. Other new studies also revealed dramatic cholesterol reducing effects with CLA supplementation. Supplementing with CLA should result in a leaner healthier body.

name: BCAA
description:
USN BCAA’s is a potent combination of the Branched Chain Amino Acids (BCAA’s) and active enhancers of both nutrient absorption and muscle uptake (mTOR Activator). The BCAA’s, which comprise of the essential amino acids leucine, isolueucine and valine, make up approximately one third of skeletal muscle in the human body, and play an important role in protein synthesis. When adequate amounts of BCAA’s are ingested post-workout, the body is placed in a greater state of hypertrophy with a positive amount of protein synthesis. This is extremely important for athletes because it will decrease recovery time as it increases the rate at which lean body mass is gained. The anti-oxidant alpha-lipoic acid (ALA) improves the action of insulin by increasing the muscle cell’s sensitivity to this hormone, which then promotes protein synthesis to an even greater extent.

name: Ultra Iso Whey WPI 908g
description:
Whey proteins are complete proteins that provide the essential aminos your body needs. It is rich in branched-chain amino acids (BCAAs) and glutamine. But not all whey proteins are alike. Some are cleaner and purer than others. Gram for gram, these superior whey protein isolates (WPIs) have more protein, less fat and carbs, than their counterparts - whey protein concentrates (WPCs). Ultra Iso Whey from Universal Nutrition contains only premium 100% ultrafiltrated whey protein isolates with zero zero sugar, zero fat, zero lactose and only a single gram of carbs.

While there are distinct differences between WPCs and WPIs, there are also differences between different WPI products, and some whey protein isolate products are purer than others. With Ultra Iso Whey Universal Nutrition don't add any gums, binders, fillers, and thickeners to weigh the shake down or interfere with the absorption of the protein. They also don't use any aspartame. And because they use only ultrafiltrated whey isolates, Ultra Iso Whey preserves many of the important biological fractions found in whey including immunoglobulins, lactoferrin, GMP, and BSA. With our Ultra Iso Whey, you get a full spectrum whey isolate protein shake that mixes easily with a spoon and goes down easy. Best of all, Ultra Iso Whey is so clean, you can actually taste the difference.

name: Soy Protein Advanced Pro 681g
description:
Soy protein for muscle-building? That’s right. A few years ago, people might have laughed at the thought of a product like Advanced Soy Pro. Not today. First, Universal Nutition's Advanced Soy Pro is a complete protein supplement – it contains all the necessary amino acids that an athlete needs to grow. Second, Advanced Soy Pro has the highest ratio of “critical cluster” amino acids (glutamine, all three branched-chain aminos, and arginine) found anywhere–higher than egg, milk and even whey! Third, Advanced Soy Pro is both cholesterol and lactose free, making it perfect for athletes wishing to avoid dairy. Finally, only Advanced Soy Pro contains less than one gram of carbs and less than two grams of fat per serving. Mounting evidence suggests that regular use of soy can benefit the athlete by promoting cardiovascular health, inhibiting the conversion of testosterone to estrogen, boosting the immune system, lowering cholesterol, preventing bone loss and more.

name: Real Gains 4.8kg
description:
Universal Nutrition's Real Gains is an extremely powerful mass-cultivating support formula that was created with you, a hardcore active and athletic individual, in mind. Real Gains has more of what you want and less of what you don't: more calories, more protein, more good fats, more taste, more fiber and far less sugar. You want to gain, muscle mass that is, and the right way to do that is with large amounts of protein, which you will find in every scoop of Real Gains, and by cutting fat intake. name: Diet Pro Protein 900g
description:
Diet Pro Protein has been formulated in consultation with some of the leading experts in weight loss science, to not only help support weight loss, but simultaneously boost tone and sculpt a more attractive body shape. When used alongside sensible calorie-controlled meals and regular exercise, it’s formulated to help men and women avoid lean muscle loss when dieting - a common problem.
 
• Targeted fat loss nutrition
High in protein, low in carbohydrates, plus Actilight prebiotic fibre, it’s the ideal healthy protein shake to drink between regular calorie-controlled meals and before/after exercise
 
• Tone-supporting whey and peptide bonded glutamine
Contains research-driven Diet-Pro protein, which includes whey that is enriched with a special type of amino acid called peptide bonded glutamine, a combination designed to help you retain muscle when exercising and dieting.
 
• Fat mobilising CLA
To help mobilise fat, Pro Protein contains a full dose (1.7g per daily serving) of the research-studied fatty acid, CLA. The nutrient may also help support body toning goals.
 
• Vit-MX-Trim and Green Tea
Optimised with the exclusive Vit-MX-Trim fat loss vitamin and mineral blend, plus research-studied green tea extract to support dieting and fat loss results. Diet Pro Protein tastes delicious and natural and mixes easily with water or skimmed milk

Ingredients:
Diet-Pro protein complex (whey protein concentrate, soya protein isolate, peptide bonded glutamine rich hydrolysed wheat protein, milk protein concentrate), glycine, maltodextrin, conjugated linoleic acid, flavouring, red beet powder (colouring), xanthan gum (stabiliser), lactase enzymes, green tea extract (camellia sinensis), nicotinamide, sucralose (sweetener), d-biotin, pteroylmonoglutamic acid, potassium iodate

Allergy Information:
Contains milk protein, lactose, gluten and soya protein.

name: Diet Pro Meal 1kg
description:
Sci-MX Diet Pro Meal is a meal replacement product for those who may be short on time, or have decided to have many small meals throughout the day but struggle with the logistics of doing it! Each serving of Sci-MX Diet Pro Meal can be thought of as having a very lean protein source (for example chicken breast, fish) plus a small carbohydrate portion such as a sweet potato.

Sci-MX Diet Pro Meal also has added digestive enzymes to avoid upset stomachs, and added vitamins and minerals which are essential to many bodily functions - in addition Sci-MX Diet Pro Meal tastes great and is a filling and thick so you won't be starving afterwards! 

SCIENTIFICALLY BALANCED MEAL: Diet-targeted protein to carb ratio ideal for nutrient support as part of a reduced calorie diet.

FATTY ACID OXIDATION: Premium grade green tea extract increases the beta-oxidation of fatty acids leading to a reduction in body fat mass.

METABOLIC SUPPORT: 50% recommended daily allowance of niacin, iodine and biotin contribute to normal energy-yielding metabolism.

ENERGY & VITALITY: Folic acid and niacin contribute to the reduction of tiredness and fatigue to support normal energy levels when dieting.

DIET SUPPORT: CLA supports a weight management diet by providing essential fatty acids the body is unable to produce.

Ingredients:
Diet-Pro protein (calcium caseinate, soya protein isolate, whey protein concentrate, peptide bonded glutamine rich hydrolysed wheat protein, whey protein isolate, egg albumin), maltodextrin, skimmed milk powder, glycine, Actilight (inulin fibre), fructose, MCT oil, rice starch, conjugated linoleic acid, cellulose gum (stabiliser), red beet powder (colouring), flavouring, lactase enzymes, potassium citrate, green tea extract (camellia sinensis), sucralose (sweetener), nicotinamide, biotin, potassium iodate, pteroylmonoglutamic acid.

Sci-MX's Mass System is a high calorie/high carb version of the original Lean Grow MRF formulation; designed for use by those with a high training intensity (over 12 hours per week) or those wishing to gain muscle mass. Consisting of Sci-MX's original protein blend, the product also offers high levels of BCCA's, and 100 grams of carbohydrates per serving. The carbohydrate blend consists primarily of high quality maltodextrin sourced from natural corn, and a small amount of fructose (fruit sugar) which has shown to replace hepatic (liver) glycogen. This product is designed for people who find it hard to gain mass (“hard gainers”) and pick up weight, as well as people that need high carbohydrate meals throughout the day or after a strenuous strength or endurance training session.

Ingredients: 
Maltodextrin, whey protein concentrate*, soy protein isolate, skimmed milk powder*, calcium caseinate*, cocoa powder, fructose, MCT oil, rice starch, flavouring, whey protein isolate*, micellar casein*, egg albumin, stabilizer: cellulose gum, potassium, phosphorus, calcium (from natural milk source*), magnesium oxide, sweetener: sucralose, ascorbic acid, d-alpha tocopherol, niacin, D-calcium-pantothenate, pyridoxine-5-phosphate, riboflavin, thiamin mononitrate, lactase enzymes, biotin, retinol, folic acid, cholecalciferol, cyanocobalamin. *Sources of lactose and milk protein.

Usage:
Add three rounded scoops (155 grams) to 450-500 ml of cool water (depending on individual preference) and shake in a hand held shaker for 30 seconds. Have 2 to 3 servings daily, servings may be halved. Use between meals, or within 30 minutes after training as a recovery drink. This product is instantised so using an electric blender is not necessary.

name: Muscle Meal Leancore 5.1kg
description:
Sci-MX's Muscle Meal Leancore contains optimum quantities of proteins, complex carbohydrates, essential fats, amino acids, vitamins and minerals to simulate a high protein, healthy meal. The nutritional profile of one serving is similar to that of one and a half chicken breasts, a medium size potato, and the vitamins and minerals that typically exist in a variety of vegetables and fruit, as well as added essential fats and vital free form and branch chain amino acids. Sci-MX's Muscle Meal Leancore often described as the "essential all-rounder" of supplements, with almost one billion servings consumed each year worldwide. 

This product is designed for anyone wanting to build muscle fast, as well as people that need balanced and nutritious meals throughout the day or after a strenuous strength or endurance training session. 

Unlike many other lean muscle gain or meal replacement formulas, Sci-MX's Muscle Meal Leancore is virtually sugar free and contains only very small amounts of purposefully added fructose (natural fruit sugars) which are the best source of liver glycogen replacement (energy stored in the liver). 

It is designed to pack muscle on fast whilst keeping fat off with an ideal protein-to-carb ratio, and provide a level of quality protein that guarantees an (promotes muscle growth) environment within the body. 

Ingredients:
maltodextrin, whey protein concentrate*, soy protein isolate, skimmed milk powder*, calcium caseinate, cocoa powder, fructose, MCT oil, rice starch, flavouring, whey protein isolate*, micellar casein*, egg albumin, stabilizer: cellulose gum, potassium, phosphorus, calcium (from natural milk source*), taurine, leucine, isoleucine, valine, magnesium oxide, sweetener: sucralose, ascorbic acid, niacin, D-calcium-pantothenate, pyridoxine-5-phosphate, riboflavin, thiamin mononitrate, lactase enzymes, biotin, folic acid, d-alpha tocopherol, cholecalciferol, cyanocobalamin. *Sources of lactose and milk protein.

Usage:
Add two rounded scoops (110 grams) to 350-400 ml of cool water (depending on individual preference) and shake in a hand held shaker for 30 seconds. Have 2 to 3 servings daily. Servings may be halved. Use between meals, or within 30 minutes after training as a recovery drink. This product is instantised so using an electric blender is not necessary.

name: Omni MX Rippedcore 2.1kg
description:
Omni-MX eliminates the confusion by supplying a perfectly synergized blend of ingredients that are tried and tested! Just two servings per day provides optimum quantities of Sci-MX’s award winning GRS-5 probiotic gradual release protein blend, Creatine Monohydrate, HMB, BCAA’s, Glycine and Taurine. Ecydestrone is also included for protein metabolism as well as Bioperine which ensures maximum absorption of all other ingredients. 

Omni-MX contains only 18 grams of carbohydrates per serving which aids with creatine transport and energy replacement, without adding body fat, and is also high in dietary fibre. 
Omni-MX is available in delicious flavours that are easily mixed with water into a potent and enjoyable shake. 
Sci-MX's Omni-MX is unquestionably a superior “all-in-one” product that is very low in fat, delicious and easily digested! This products’ introduction into the industry marks the end of guess work and confusion – now you can just get the results you want!

Ingredients:
Maltodextrin, whey protein concentrate and isolate, fructooligosaccharides, acacia fibre, soy protein isolate, creatine monohydrate, MCT oil, HMB, dextrose monohydrate, micellar casein, egg albumin, fructose, flavour, rice starch, l-leucine, beta alanine, glycine, stabilisers: (guar gum, xanthan gum), taurine, l-valine, l-isoleucine, potassium, raponthicum carthamoides, lactase enzymes, bioperine, sweetener: sucralose, chromium citrate.

Recommended use: 
Mix 2 level scoops (70 grams) with 300 ml of water in a hand held shaker or mix in a large glass with a fork and drink within 5 minutes of mixing. An electric blender may be used but is not necessary. Take 2 servings per day, every day of the week. Training days: If you train early in the morning, have one serving after training and one serving mid afternoon between meals. If you train in the evening, take one serving mid afternoon between meals and one serving after training. Rest days: On rest days take one serving mid morning between meals, and one mid afternoon between meals. Omni-MX is a complex blend of various potent ingredients and you may experience a slight nutrient aftertaste. This is normal.

name: Pro VX Protein 900g
description:
Sci-MX Pro-VX Protein is a blend of several plant protein sources; soya, brown rice and peas. While you will probably be familiar with protein blends in general (for example Sci-MX's excellent GRS-9 Hour Protein) the plant based protein sources are fairly new to the market - what is the difference?

The main difference between plant based proteins and milk based proteins is the amino acid profile - what it is made up of. If you get a fairly balanced diet then the amino acid profile of your protein shake won't make very much difference and both have their advantages and disadvantages - Pro-VX has a lot more arginine than Sci-MX GRS 9 Hour Protein, but typically less leucine. Arginine is important for nitric oxide production whereas leucine more so for 'kickstarting' muscle repair. It is important to note though that both types of product contain all of the amino acids, and the differences are minimal.

Taste-wise Sci-MX Pro-VX is very creamy and has a bit of a nutty flavour compared to the more milk-like taste of GRS 9 Hour Protein. One major advantage of choosing Sci-MX Pro-VX Protein though is the cost; at the time of writing it is almost 20% cheaper than GRS 9 Hour Protein and actually contains more protein than GRS 9 Hour Protein - whichever you choose you are getting a fantastic quality protein supplement!

This 2.2kg / 5lb tub contains 49 servings and will last most people around one month.

Ingredients:
Pro-VX protein blend (soya protein isolate, pea protein extract, brown rice bran protein), calcium carbonate, flavouring, guar gum (stabiliser), red beet powder (colouring), isoleucine, magnesium oxide, leucine, xanthan gum (stabiliser), ascorbic acid, ferrous gluconate, sucralose (sweetener), zinc oxide, cupric gluconate, calcium D-pantothenate, cyanocobalamin, pyridoxine-5-phosphate, pteroylmonoglutamic acid

Allergy Information:
Contains no nut ingredients, but may contain traces of peanuts and various types of nuts and seeds.

name: Ultra Whey Protein 2.2kg
description:
Sci-MX’s Ultra Whey Protein contains a blend of whey protein isolate and concentrate only. This product offers the highest BV (Biological Value) protein source available, rich in branched-chain amino acids (BCAA’s) and is very quickly synthesised and made available to recovering muscles. Sci-MX’s Ultra Whey Protein is ideal as a post-workout protein source.

Ingredients:
Whey protein isolate* and concentrate* from micro-filtration, premium cocoa powder, flavouring, lactase enzymes, and sweetener: sucralose. Contains no preservatives or artificial colourings. *Sources of lactose and milk protein

Recommended Usage:
Add two rounded scoops (45 grams) to 300ml of cool water in a handheld shaker and shake for 30 seconds. Have 2 to 3 servings daily. This product is instantised so using an electric blender is not necessary.

name: Whey Plus Hardcore 2.1kg
description:
WHY CHOOSE Sci-MX WHEY+ HARDCORE™

• Only contains premium quality whey protein from cold pressed microfiltration
• Rich in highly bioavailable peptide bonded glutamine for hardcore growth-support
• Enhanced with a unique synergy of nutrients designed to support GH release, power and growth
HOW WHEY+ HARDCORE™ WORKS

If you want to maximise the growth-response from weight training – WHEY+ HARDCORE™’s unique synergy of muscle-building nutrition is formulated to force your body to grow - faster!

Designed specifically for hardcore gym trainers and power athletes, WHEY+ HARDCORE™ is possibly the most natural protein supplement available, containing a matrix of research-proven muscle growth nutrients: Ultra-bioactive whey protein to support rapid growth, glycine to enhance natural GH release, Creatacore™ creatine & pyruvate for enhanced workout power, and naturally high levels of BCAAs to saturate your muscles with key growth-supporting amino acids.

Unlike other advanced whey based protein shakes, WHEY+ HARDCORE™ is produced using only superior quality ingredients, meaning it tastes natural and delicious and mixes easily with water or milk.
MAXIMISE RESULTS – COMBINE WITH OTHER SCI-MX PRODUCTS

• For explosive pre-workout power and energy combine with X-PLODE+ HARDCORE™
• For maximum, natural male hormone enhancement combine with ZMA+ HARDCORE™
• For gaining muscle size whilst losing fat combine with CLA LEAN-1000™

Ingredients: 
Ultra-peptide™ whey protein complex (cross flow micro-filtered whey protein concentrate*, rich hydrolysed wheat protein, milk protein concentrate*, soy lecithin), Creatacore™ creatine matrix (creatine monohydrate and creatine pyruvate), cocoa powder (chocolate flavour only), l-glycine, flavour, red beet powder (strawberry flavour only), xantham gum (stabiliser), natural flavour, sucralose (sweetener). *Sources of lactose and milk protein.

Add 1 heaped scoop (35g) to a shaker with 250 – 300ml water and shake well.  On training days, take one serving 30 minutes before your workout and another immediately after. On rest days, have two shakes per day in between meals.

name: Whey Plus Rippedcore 2.2kg
description:
Sci-MX Whey Plus Rippedcore is ideal for both men and women looking to slim down and tone up. You take whey plus rippedcore either in place of a small meal or inbetween meals and the precise combination of whey protein, CLA and green tea combine to help you lose fat naturally.

As well as being a very effective formula Sci-MX Whey Plus Rippedcore tastes fantastic and mixes perfectly in a hand held shaker to produce a shake that is a real pleasure to drink - with build and trim whey you will actually look forward to having your supplements!

Available in three delicious flavours
Added fat loss CLA and Green Tea
Vit-MX Trim helps you metabolise protein, carbs and fats
Sci-MX Whey Plus Rippedcore is available in three delicious flavours - chocolate, strawberry and vanilla - and many of our customers buy a tub of each flavour to alternate on different days. The added Actilight prebiotic helps you digest this product without any bloating; making it even more of a pleasure to drink. This 2.2kg tub is the largest size tub of Whey Plus Rippedcore and the best value; if you'd like to try it before committing to this amount then Whey Plus Rippedcore does also come in a 900g 'taster' tub.

Ingredients:
Rippedcore protein complex (whey protein concentrate, soya protein isolate, milk protein concentrate, peptide bonded glutamine rich hydrolysed wheat protein), glycine, Actilight (inulin fibre), maltodextrin, conjugated linoleic acid, flavouring, MCT oil, red beet powder (colouring), sodium chloride, xanthan gum (stabiliser), green tea extract (camellia sinensis), sucralose (sweetener), nicotinamide, d-biotin, pteroylmonoglutamic acid, potassium iodate.

Allergy Information:
Contains milk protein, lactose, soya and gluten. Contains no nut ingredients, but may contain traces of peanuts and various types of nuts and seeds. May contain egg.

name: Pro-Antium 528g
description:
Ronnies whey… go big or go home.
A bodybuilder's diet revolves around one key element…Protein! Being that I have over 20 years of experience in the highest competitive level of bodybuilding and the fact that I've won a record 8 Mr. Olympia titles, I know a thing or two about protein supplementation. Pro-Antium has been designed with one purpose in mind: to provide you with the highest quality protein at the most concentrated level.
 
Product Highlights:

- Multifaceted protein blend for complete recovery

- Fortified with 3.5g bcaas, 5g creatine, and 2.5g betaine

- REAL cookie pieces and only 1g of sugar

- 29g protein per scoop

- 50 servings per bottle
Container Size: 528g
Serving Size: 1 scoop (44g)
Servings Per Container: 12
 
Amount Per Serving:
Total Calories: 192
Protein: 29g
Total Carbohydrates: 10g
-Sugars: 1g
-Dietary Fibre: 0.5g
Fat: 2.5g
-Saturates: 0.5g
Sodium: 0.11mg

Ingredients:
Coleman Protein Matrix (Whey Protein Concentrate, Milk Protein Isolate, Whey Protein Isolate, Whey Protein Hydrolisate, Micellar Casein, Egg Albumin, Calcium Caseinate), Coleman AminoMatrix (L-Glycine, L-Leucine, L-Isoleucine, L-Valine), Coleman Lipid Matrix [Sunflower Oil Powder and/or Soy Oil Powder, MCT Oil Powder (from coconut)], Creatine Monohydrate, Betaine, Copenhagen Cookie Crumbs [Enriched Flour (Wheat flour, niacin, reduced iron, thiamine mononitrate, riboflavin, folic acid), Sugar, Soy Bean and/or Palm Oils, Corn Syrup, Salt, Vanilla], Coleman Suspension Matrix (Glucose Polymers, Inulin, Xanthan Gum, Cellulose Gum, Carrageenan), Natural and Artificial Flavours, Citric Acid, Sea Salt, Acesulfame Potassium, Sucralose, FD&C Red #40

Please Note: Nutritional facts and ingredients may vary slightly between flavours.
 
Allergens: Manufactured on equipment which processes products containing milk, egg, soybeans, shellfish, wheat and tree nuts.
Recommended Use for Males: Take 1-2 scoops with 4-6oz to 8oz of cold water or your favourite beverage. Use approximately 4-6oz of liquid per 1 scoop of powder. Vary the amount of your chosen liquid to acquire your desired flavour and consistency. Drink 1-4 servings daily, including after your workout to achieve your bodybuilding and fitness goals. To further increase protein intake and to create a milkshake-like consistency, try adding fat-free or low-fat milk in place of water.
 
Recommended Use for Females: Take 1 scoop with 4-6oz of cold water or your favourite beverage. Vary the amount of your chosen liquid to acquire your desired flavour and consistency. Drink 1-4 servings daily, including after your workout to achieve your fitness goals. To further increase protein intake and to create a milkshake-like consistency, try adding fat-free or low-fat milk in place of water.

description:
I am proud to introduce you to Myo-Blitz, which I believe to be the world's strongest pre-training muscle supplement. Myo-Blitz has been engineered to provide you with the maximum amount of clean, intense energy & surreal focus without the use of DMAA that can inhibit pumps! Most importantly Myo-Blitz will flood your body with muscle-support ingredients.
 
Product Highlights:

- Clean DMAA free intense energy and mental focus, no jitters!

- Free of performance and pump inhibiting ingredients

- Inclusion of aHICA (alpha-hydroxy-isocaproic acid or leucic acid)

- Fortified with astragin to amplify N.O. production

- Fat burning support

Other Ingredients: Natural and Artificial Flavours, Maltodextrin, Silica, Sucralose, Acesulfame-K, FD and C Red #40

As a dietary supplement, begin by mixing 1 level scoop of Myo-Blitz with 6oz of water and drink immediately on an empty stomach 30 minutes before training. DO NOT take more than 1 scoop per day. DO NOT exceed recommended use.

name: Vegan Protein 2.1kg
description:
Vegan Protein delivers an exceptional nutritional profile along with great taste, additional Digezyme digestive enzymes and LactoSpore probiotic spores that is perfect for all sports people or anyone else looking for a high quality vegan protein.
 
One of Nature's best proteins
The vegan sourced protein in Vegan Protein is made from a patented manufacturing process. The unique and environmentally friendly process extracts pure European pea protein from Pisum Sativum using water and no chemicals. This provides what Reflex Nutrition believe to be the perfect instant mixing vegan protein powder that is highly digestible and directly comparable to the best animal sources of protein like whey, eggs and milk. This great tasting instant mixing product provides 74% protein that has 98% digestibility and a great amino acid score of 95%.
 
Vegan Protein contains more BCAA's, more arginine and more glutamine for the athlete
The critically important branched-chain amino acids, L-Leucine, L-Isoleucine and L-Valine, which are responsible for building, repairing and maintaining muscle tissue are contained in abundance. In fact, pea protein contains more BCAA's than the best egg white protein. Further pea protein contains up to double the amount of arginine, responsible for growth, repair and nitric oxide synthesis, when compared to whey protein. Finally pea protein contains higher amounts of Glutamine compared to whey protein and egg protein. Overall the amino acid profile of pea protein is one of the greatest for supplying sportsmen and women's most valuable amino acids.
 
A Vegan Protein that is Soy Free, Gluten Free and GM free
There are a number of vegan based proteins available but few can claim to be soy free, gluten free, GM free and be allergen free too. Not to mention the fact that the pea protein found in Vegan Protein is one the most environmentally sound proteins in the world, with an absence of nitrogen fertilizers from the growing process. The factory in which the pea protein is processed is dedicated to these pea products.
 
Vegan Protein is Sweetened with stevia
Stevia is a collection of plants that have been used for hundreds of years for sweetening food and drinks. The natural sweetness of stevia is captured by steeping it in water and then purifying to provide a calorie-free sweet taste.
 
Vegan Protein contains added probiotics & digestive enzymes
Another big difference that sets Vegan Protein apart from the competition is the standard inclusion of the very special Digezyme digestive enzyme complex and LactoSpore probiotic spores. Digezyme has been extensively studied and may enhance protein digestion, whilst LactoSpore probiotic spores, similar to those found in yoghurt, may help support a healthy digestive system.
 
Impeccably manufactured with green energy
Vegan protein is made in Reflex Nutrition's brand new state of the art facility in accordance with IS09001 quality control procedures - each and every batch of Vegan Protein is tested to ensure it meets labelled protein levels. You'll also be pleased to hear that Vegan Protein was manufactured using 100% deep green energy which is sourced completely from renewable sources.

 Suitable for vegans

• Free from artificial sweeteners and colourings.

• Made using Deep Green energy

• Soy free formula
Container Size: 2,100g
Serving Size: 2 scoops (25g)
Servings Per Container: 84
 
Amount Per Serving:
 
Total Calories: 92
Protein: 18.5g
Total Carbohydrates: 1g
-Sugars: 0.4g
-Dietary Fibre: 0.9g
Fat: 1.4g
-Saturates: 0.7g
Sodium: 0.3g
Digestive Enzymes (Digezyme): 40mg
Probiotics (Lactospore): 50,000,000 Spores
 
Ingredients:

Pea Protein (from Pisum Sativum peas), Natural Colourings (Fat Reduced Cocoa Powder (chocolate varieties only), Betanin (berry and fruit varieties only), Beta Carotene (banana, vanilla and smooth fruit varieties only)), Flavourings, Thickener (carboxymethyl cellulose), Natural Sweetener (Stevia), Digezyme Digestive Enzyme Complex (Amylase, Protease, Cellulase, Lactase, Lipase), LactoSpore Probiotic Spores (Bacillus Coagulans).
 
Please Note:  Nutritional facts and ingredients may vary slightly between flavours.

name: Thermo Fusion 100ct
description:
For years loyal Reflex Nutrition customers have been asking for a fat loss formula that contains the latest nutraceutical advances containing optimal doses and guaranteed results. Well the wait is finally over - Reflex Nutrition proudly introduce the totally exclusive Thermo Fusion fat loss product. This is a completely new product that has been developed using over a decade’s expertise from the Reflex Nutrition research and development team.

Thermo Fusion sets a completely new benchmark in fat loss formulae. It’s guaranteed to be the most effective legal weight management formula available. Thermo Fusion contains perfectly safe and scientifically proven ingredients to help you get the results you want faster when combined with an effective training and dietary regime. Each serving of Thermo Fusion contains a potent industry leading dose of of L-Carnitine, Green Tea extract, Caffeine, Choline, L-Phenylalanine, Cayenne Pepper, ALA, Bioperine and Chromium.

Thermo Fusion is made in Reflex Nutrition's own state of the art factory. Other diets pills are often contract packed adding a large chunk to the overall cost of the product, often making the product either expensive or poor in terms of ingredients and dosages. Precise control over manufacturing and selection of the finest ingredients are often recipes for success. That’s why quality control at Reflex Nutrition is so important. Thermo Fusion is made in accordance with very strict ISO9001 quality control procedures and only contains the purest, highest quality ingredients available.

Container Size: 100 Capsules 
Serving Size: 4 Capsules 
Servings Per Container: 25 

Amount Per Serving: 
L-Carnitine Tartrate: 500mg 
Acetyl-L-Carnitine: 500mg 
D-L-Phenylalanine: 500mg 
Green Tea Extract (95% Polyphenols): 300mg 
Choline: 300mg 
Alpha Lipoic Acid: 200mg 
Cayenne Pepper Extract: 200mg

Other Ingredients: 

Gelatin capsule 
Start by taking 2 capsules half an hour before meals (preferably only breakfast and lunch for the first 2 days to assess tolerance) then take up to a maximum of 4 capsules before each meal.

On training days take up to 4 capsules half an hour before exercise.

description:
The Edge Xtreme sports drink provides a great source of isotonic energy with added caffeine. Providing two sources of energy for rapid energy replenishment.

Reflex The Edge Xtreme RTD is one of the few isotonic energy drinks available that not only replaces electrolytes like sodium and potassium but also magnesium and zinc.

name: Peptide Fusion 2.1kg
description:
Many brands claim to offer a flagship blended protein that is market leading but conceal the most important aspects of the formulation.  Peptide Fusion sets an unbeaten standard for a blended protein by using the very highest quality ingredients in optimised ratios.  It includes the finest preferentially selected whey protein, chosen for its superior levels of Branch Chain Amino Acids and higher levels of protein, the finest, cold processed ultra filtered milk protein providing undenatured micellar casein along with the purest egg white protein available on the market.  These are all assayed in the lab with custom manufactured flavourings, natural colourings and an absence of salt, artificial colouring and indeed anything that represents a compromise to health.

Perhaps more importantly, we clearly state the ratios of the main 3 superior proteins so that you know exactly how much of each protein source has been used.  This is opposed to the secret ‘proprietary blend’ approaches that are sometimes nothing more than a low quality and low cost mix of milk, egg and cheap soy. You can nearly always tell by looking at the ingredients list.  If whey protein appears first then the majority of the protein in the tub will be whey protein because legally ingredients have to be listed in order of quantity. That is not necessarily what you want if you are buying a blend for its time release properties.  Ideally you would want to see micellar casein first on the ingredient list. Peptide Fusion contains a blend of 33:33:33 Micellar Casein, Egg White Isolate and undenatured whey protein with all protein fractions present and proven by lab assay. The formulation is finished in a base of glutamine peptides and digestive enzymes and Lactospore pro-biotics for their health focused benefits relating to gut health.

Contains three proteins which have their own inherent benefits and digests at a different rate offering prolonged anabolic support;

Micellar casein, which is a slow digesting protein.

Egg white protein isolate.  It has a medium rate of digestion.

Bioactive ultra filtered whey protein concentrate.  It is a fast digesting protein.

description:
Instant Whey Deluxe is The Best Tasting Whey Protein Available
Instant Whey Deluxe is a variant of Instant Whey, probably the most highly respected whey protein in the UK today.  The Deluxe variant focuses on flavour and Reflex Nutrition are confident that you will agree that it is simply the best tasting whey protein product you can buy today. This has been achieved by using the very best and most expensive ingredients available such as real freeze dried strawberry puree for their strawberry flavour and the richest, darkest, cocoa for an amazing chocolate experience. Make no mistake, Instant Whey Deluxe is by far the best tasting whey protein shake you’ll ever experience.

Whey Protein Concentrate & Isolate as the primary ingredients
Instant Whey Deluxe contains whey protein concentrate & isolate as the main source of protein; arguably the most expensive and purest forms of protein available, other brands may contain inferior sources of protein like soy or pea.  Instant Whey Deluxe also contains Reflex Nutrition's totally exclusive Muscle Drive peptide complex. This complex is a precise combination of two muscle building ingredients:

Peptide Bonded Glutamine

Hydrolysed Whey Protein

Added Pro Biotics & Digestive Enzymes

Preferentially selected Whey Protein, the Best Reflex Nutrition go to great lengths to ensure that Instant Whey Deluxe contains preferentially selected batches of whey protein which are carefully chosen to meet a very strict criteria that dictate higher levels of protein, lower levels of fat and lower levels of carbs. Its all sourced from the EU and does NOT contain any hormones or heavy metals which can be found in some non EU material.

Instant Whey Deluxe contains Bio-Active Fractions
The whey protein found in Insant Whey Deluxe is made using cross flow micro filtration and ultra filtration. These unique processes are carried out at low temperature to preserve many beneficial bio-active whey fractions like Glycomacropeptide, Lactoferrin, Immunoglobulin and others.

name: Instant Whey 4.4kg
description:
New Instant Whey including native whey is set to change the face of sports nutrition.  By using native whey protein isolate in the formula, it provides significant, unique, performance and health benefits.  It is unmatched within the market.
 
Native whey provides significant additional benefits, critically containing up to 166% more bioavailable cystine (two cysteine molecules linked by a disulphide bridge) and up to 16% more L-leucine than other forms of whey protein.  L-leucine helps build and repair muscle, whilst cystine is essential in the production of the body’s master antioxidant glutathione which is vital for optimal immune function and therefore recovery after strenuous exercise.
 
Reflex partnered with one of the world’s newest, most sophisticated and environmentally sound dairies to bring you native whey protein isolate extracted directly from fresh skimmed milk.  It is this superior process that is carried out at low temperature via complex ultra and membrane filtration that captures virtually every single highly valuable biologically active protein fraction in its native form.
 
Just like the previous formula Instant Whey is still one of the only whey protein powders in the world where every finished batch is laboratory tested to ensure that it delivers a market leading 80% level of protein.  This is done in accordance with ISO 17025 quality standards and procedures.
 
Instant Whey contains an improved version of the Reflex renowned Muscle Drive peptide complex.  This complex is a precise combination of two muscle building ingredients:
 
Peptide-bonded glutamine:  This is glutamine in a highly absorbable format, especially suited for use in combination with native whey protein where it is utilised more effectively by the body than standard free form L-glutamine, thus helping recovery after strenuous exercise.
 
Hydrolysed whey protein:  Newly formulated with higher levels of whey protein hydrolsate.  This is specially selected with a high degree of hydrolysis which is rich in low molecular weight peptides and amino acids.  The body can absorb peptides much faster than whole proteins, thus allowing for an almost instantaneous 'hit' of muscle building amino acids.
 
Added probiotics & digestive enzymes
Another big difference that has always set Instant Whey apart from the competition is the standard inclusion of the very special Digezyme digestive enzyme complex and LactoSpore probiotic spores.  Digezyme has been extensively studied and shown to enhance protein digestion, whilst LactoSpore probiotic spores, similar to those found in yoghurt, provide for a healthier gut.

• Guaranteed 80% level of protein  

• Native whey protein isolate is a main ingredient

• Contains our exclusive Muscle Drive peptide complex

Serving Size: 2 scoops (25g)
Servings Per Container: 180

Ingredients:

Preferentially selected protein blend (Native Whey Protein Isolate, Ultra Filtered Whey Protein Concentrate), Muscle Drive (Peptide-bonded Glutamine (derived from Wheat Protein), Hydrolysed Whey Protein (degree of hydrolysis 30%)), Flavouring, Natural Colouring (Fat Reduced Cocoa Powder (chocolate flavours only), Betanin (strawberry & raspberry flavours only), Beta Carotene (banana & vanilla flavours only)), Artificial Sweeteners (Acesulfame K, Sucralose), Digezyme Digestive Enzyme Complex (Amylase, Protease, Cellulase, Lactase, Lipase), Emulsifier (Soya Lecithin), LactoSpore Probiotic Spores (Bacillus Coagulans).

name: Instant Mass 5.4kg
description:
Instant Mass is not a typical weight gainer. It is an ultra high quality product made with a near perfect 50/50 split of protein and carbohydrate.

Instant Mass is arguably the best weight gainer product you can buy on the market today for three very simple reasons:

1. It contains more protein than ANY other brand.

2. It contains lower GI carbs, where other brands will use maltodextrin or dextrose.

3. Every batch is tested for protein, and protein is perhaps the most important aspect of gaining quality muscle mass.

Instant Mass provides 54 grams of the highest quality proteins available per serving. An amazing high quality blend of undenatured ultra filtered whey protein concentrate, undenatured milk protein concentrate (80% micellar casein, 20% whey protein) and Egg White Protein Isolate. Instant Mass contains our exclusive Muscle DriveTM complex, a combination of the amino acid glutamine which has been peptide bonded so that it can pass into the blood more easily and whey protein hydrolysate which provides more easily absorbed protein chains. For added benefit we also include Digezyme® digestive enzymes and Lactospore® probiotics.

The Ultimate Lower GI Source of Carbohydrates
Instant Mass was the first weight gainer in the world to use an exclusive blend of organic oats and barley. In fact, it is still one of the only weight gainers you can buy today which offers an organic whole grain source of carbohydrate. This carbohydrate source provides a low glycemic source of energy along with naturally occurring vitamins, minerals and dietary fibre.

Added Zinc, Magnesium and Antioxidants
Instant Mass contains vital minerals like magnesium which is essential for muscle contractile strength and zinc which plays an important role in maintaining testosterone levels. Couple this with added antioxidants and you have a nutrient package that few can better.

Stuff we don't add
As with all Reflex products, Instant Mass only contains the finest quality ingredients available. More importantly, Instant Mass does not contain any added soy protein, corn syrup, dextrose, hydrogenated fats, cheap vegetable oils, added sugar or salt!

Compare Instant Mass to other weight gainers
Please compare Instant Mass to the competition. In nearly every case the competition will have less protein, more sugar and more fat, and offer less in terms of value for money.

name: Diet Protein 2kg
description:
Diet Protein is arguably the most sophisticated diet shake available today.  Reflex Nutrition have used the latest advances in protein and weight loss technology to bring you a product that is specifically designed to aid those interested in maintaining a healthy, well defined and toned body.

Diet Protein contains unique bioactive peptides & over 100% RDA of calcium per daily serving
Diet protein uses a unique ratio of purified whey protein and micellar casein to provide an unrivalled source of protein that contains bioactive peptides that may help curb appetite, boost glutathionine levels (antioxidants), promote healthy intestinal flora and provide essential amino acids for recovery from exercise.  In addition to providing an extremely high quality source of protein, Diet Protein also provides natural dairy calcium which is scientifically proven to assist in accelerating fat and weight loss.  Note: Does not contain inferior soya protein like some brands products.  Soya protein has a lower biological value compared to whey and micellar casein.

Diet Protein contains patented Clarinol CLA (conjugated linoleic acid), a safe, natural, research proven diet aid. One daily serving of diet protein provides 3.2g of Clarinol CLA which may help keep the weight off and maintain a better shaped figure.  A natural source of conjugated linoleic acid (CLA), Clarinol CLA can decrease body fat while at the same time, increase lean muscle mass.

Recently completed research has confirmed that 3.2g of CLA the exact same amount as found in each daily serving of diet protein, not only easily helped reduce body fat, but that it did so in specific areas of the body where fat loss is most desired without extra dieting or exercise efforts.  The results of the six-month clinical trial showed that the reduction in fat mass primarily occurs in the abdomen and particularly in women, the legs.  Clarinol is also offered by Reflex in easy to swallow softgel capsules.  For more information on Clarinol please visit www.reflex-nutrition.com or the official Clarinol website www.clarinol.com.  

Whilst other diet shakes might contain CLA, it is often in smaller amounts.  Research proves that you need to take 3.2g of CLA per day to see the best results.

Diet Protein provides additional nutraceutical support
Each serving of diet protein is packed with additional diet support.  Green tea extract and L-carnitine L-tartrate are added for their long standing reputation of aiding dieters.  LactoSpore probiotic spores are included to promote a healthy intestinal environment.

Diet Protein contains no added sugar or maltodextrin.  It is perfect for dieters wanting to restrict their carbohydrate content.

name: Creatine Monohydrate
description:
Creatine naturally occurs in the body; it is present in every human cell and functions as an energy store. Depending on body weight and muscle mass, the body stores between 100 and 150gms of Creatine, of which about 2 to 4 grams are used every day for normal activity. Half of the required Creatine is produced by the body itself, the rest must be obtained daily from food. For an optimal supply of Creatine, 500g of raw meat or raw fish must be consumed every day. Because this is hardly feasible in practice, supplementary Creatine makes sense and is recommended.

The subject of more than 300 studies, it is one of the most researched of all supplements. Creatine Monohydrate is universally recognized as offering the potential to increase maximal strength and endurance by up to 15% in speed sports as well as intensive weight training, even in the short term. Improvement can be as high as 20% for maximal strength in interval training; approximately 30% for power increase and energy release in short sprints and up to 15% in training for repeated sprints. Creatine intake also results in improved concentration, higher endurance in training and faster recovery.

Creatine Monohydrate is ideal for a broad range of sports people; from bodybuilders through to those who need explosive power in their chosen sport or those involved in speed sports. There are a broad variety of Creatines available on the market today and it is critical that you choose a research proven safe source.

What makes Creapure Creatine different from the competition?
Whilst there are many different forms of Creatine available on the market today, Creapure is the only Creatine in the world to be consistently tested free from impurities and by-products. Manufactured by AlzChem of Germany, Creapure Creatine is the only choice for those who want a research proven safe source of Creatine. This is especially important since other sources of Creatine potentially contain impurities and by-products including Creatinine (CRN), dicyandiamide (DCD), Dihydrotriazine (DHT) and Thiourea.

Serving Size: 1 scoop (5g)
Servings Per Container: 20

name: Muscle Shakes RTD 12x 469ml
description:
M-Shake was brought to life by the innovative team at Real Nutrition Co. This powered up milk shake gives a big shot of protein, 13 Vitamins and Minerals and delivers sustained release energy to keep you going strong.  It’s fat free but still packs Real Nutrition’s trademark awesome taste!
 
The story goes..."Real Nutrition wanted to make the most awesome shake ever! So headed down to the lab and found a cool ingredient called Isomaltulose. This special low GI carbohydrate delivers natural sweetness, and has been used in Japan for many years.  Technically a sugar, Isomaltulose digests slowly and supports the sustained release energy properties of milk.  The Real Nutrition team then beefed up the protein, ripped out the fat and loaded extra B vitamins to stack it out.  Many moons later and after countless flavour experiments (to make it taste awesome!) the supercharged, super-tasty M-Shake was born."

name: Liquid L-Carnitine Extra 473ml
description:
Carnitine is an amino acid biosynthesized from the 2 other amino acids, lysine and methionine. L-carnitine is a naturally occurring substance found in most cells of the body, particularly the brain, neural tissue, muscle, and heart. Carnitine, whose structure is similar to choline, is widely available in animal foods (meat, poultry, fish and dairy products), whereas plants have very small amounts. PVL use a stabilized L-Carnitine-L-Tartrate as the primary source for maximum quality, efficacy and benefit.
 
What does L-Carnitine do?
Carnitine oxidizes fat - in living cells, it is required for the transport of fatty acids into the mitochondria during the breakdown of lipids (fats) for the generation of metabolic energy. Boosting exercise performance, improving body tone, body composition and fat loss are the most dominant uses. L-carnitine is also widely used for maintaining heart health. Recent (April 2012) information from the Linus Pauling Institute at Oregon State University also indicates that the roles of L-carnitine supplementation have shown promise as a possible adjunct therapy in some illnesses.
 
PVL Essentials Liquid L-Carnitine has the following features:

• Zero carbs, zero sugar and zero calories

• No artificial sweeteners, colours or flavours

• Tastes great with new stevia isolate

• May support heart health

• Boosts fat loss

• Enhances exercise performance

• Full clinical dose

Serving Size: 1 Tablespoon (15mL)
Servings Per Container: 33
 
Amount Per Serving:
 
Total Calories: 0
L-Carnatine & L-Carnatine-L-Tartrate: 1,000mg
 
Other Ingredients:

Purified water, vegetable glycerine, stevia, natural fruit punch flavour, natural sorbic acid.

So finally, athletes and bodybuilders have a natural alternative to steroids and untested prohormones to boost their testosterone levels, which of course would be expected to enhance muscular recovery from exercise, increase strength and accelerate the muscle-building process.
 
As with all PVL Essentials products, their D-Aspartic Acid is certified, researched, tested and athlete-approved.

name: PHD CLA 90ct
description:
Lean and Tone system
Conjugated linoleic acids (CLA) are a family of at least 28 isomers of linoleic acid found mainly in the meat and dairy products derived from cud chewing mammals called ruminants. As the name implies, the double bonds of CLAs are conjugated, with only one single bond between them. CLA is a linoleic fatty acid and has long been used as a weight management formula within the sports nutrition and diet industry.
 
CLA is an extremely popular product for dieters and over 30 clinical studies have been published investigating the effect of CLA on weight management. PhD also use CLA within our top selling weight management and diet formulas, Diet Whey and the Diet Whey bar. CLA is also an extremely popular product to be stacked (combined) with Lean Degree.
 
PhD CLA is ideal for:

Men and women looking for weight management

Athletes stacking it with Lean Degree for dual effect

Health conscious individuals interested in performance

Body builders, athletes and slimmers.

Serving Size: 1 Softgel Capsule (1000mg) 
Servings Per Container: 90 

Amount Per Serving: 

Conjugated Linoleic Acid (80% active isomers): 1000mg
 
Ingredients:

Use 1 capsule, 3 times daily with food.

name: Ripped Freak 60ct
description:
The world's first hybrid fat burner!
New Ripped Freak is the world's first and only hybrid fat burner! Ripped Freak's hybrid formula addresses every major fat-loss mechanism known to scientists and researchers around the world and contains never-before-seen, newly synthesized fat-burning ingredients, best described as "hybrid lipolytic compounds".

A "hybrid lipolytic compound" is a term that's been coined by our team of pharmaceutical and organic chemists. A hybrid is defined as a compound derived from nature that has been organically altered or synthesized to deliver more powerful effects!
 
RF hybrid science - the latest innovation in fat-loss supplementation!
With so many new research findings every year, it's hard to keep up-to-date with the latest in supplement science. That being said, if your goal is to develop a ripped-to-the-bone physique, then the right supplements can go a long way in helping you maximize fat loss! So, what are some of the most effective fat-burning compounds currently available on the market? Well, the latest research is pointing directly at some newly created ingredients called "hybrid lipolytic compounds." You're probably wondering what the heck are "hybrid lipolytic compounds" and how are they going to help you increase fat loss? Well, read on and get the inside scoop on this latest innovation in fat-loss supplementation!

Optimum Nutrition's 2:1:1 Recovery is based on the latest science demonstrating that blending different types of carbs and proteins maximizes absorption and leads to better results than the use of larger amounts of any single type.

name: Platinum Hydro Whey 1.5kg
description:
Platinum Hydrowhey is the fastest, purest, most advanced whey protein Optimum's ever developed. In a word: excellence. What else would you expect from the most proven protein brand? By hydrolyzing the protein in this premium formula we've created our fastest-acting whey protein yet. Hydrolyzing breaks larger proteins down into smaller pieces that are able to get into your system rapidly, enabling your muscles to start rebuilding quickly. For added effectiveness, we've also enhanced this revolutionary formula with digestive enzymes and micronized branched chain amino acids (BCAAs). In addition to being fast, Platinum Hydrowhey is also ultra-pure. That's because it's made entirely with hydrolyzed whey protein isolates. So there's no excess fat, cholesterol, or lactose to slow down your progress.


By combining the absolute finest ingredients with a series of highly specialized processing techniques Optimum Nutrition (ON) has created its most valuable muscle building protein yet. Everything about Platinum Hydrowhey was designed with an uncompromising attitude toward performance - both in the gym and your shaker cup.

Before Workouts: Platinum Hydrowhey mixed with skim milk + Micronized Creatine powder. Why? Hundreds of clinical studies support creatine monohydrate's ability to boost strength, size, and power. Combining creatine with protein and carbohydrate increases muscle uptake.

After Workouts: Platinum Hydrowhey mixed with iced coffee + Glycomaize + Glutamine Powder. Why? At no other time throughout the day are your muscles as receptive to nutrients as they are post-workout. Fast-acting proteins, free form amino acids, and quickly digested carbohydrates provide building blocks for rebuilding and replenishment. Recent research also suggests that a shot of caffeine (in this case, from the iced coffee) may also help facilitate greater glycogen resynthesis, which means you'll be ready to go for your next workout.

Before Bed: Gold Standard 100% Casein + Instantized BCAA 5000 powder. Why? Rapid digestion is beneficial during the day while you are active. But, slower is better at night. Casein proteins and BCAAs help protect and preserve your hard earned muscle tissue throughout the night while you sleep.

name: Opti-Men 90ct
description:
New Opti-Men is much more than just a multi-vitamin. The 70 active ingredients that go into Optimum’s unique formula will help to optimise your physical and mental performance.
 
What does it do?
When you’re training hard, your body has greater nutritional needs. It’s not always possible to source these solely from your diet every single day. Vitamins and minerals provide a vital nutritional boost to help you cope with the demands of a fast-paced lifestyle.
 
When’s the best time to take my multi-vit?
For best results, take 1 tablet with each of your 3 main meals. Always remember to have one at breakfast for a boost after your body has been fasting overnight. It’s also a great idea to plan to take one after workouts to replenish the nutrients lost and improve recovery. Optimum Nutrition make a multi-vitamin specially formulated for women too.

name: CGT-10 600g
description:
Optimum Nutrition's CGT-10 is an advanced formula that combines three amazingly effective ingredients: creatine, glutamine & taurine. Each serving provides 5 grams of CreaPure brand creatine monohydrate, 3 grams of L-glutamine and 2 grams of taurine.
 
Creatine is bodybuilding's ultimate supplement, and for good reason. For one thing, creatine can significantly increase lean muscle mass in just two weeks. It is also responsible for improving performance in high-intensity exercise, increasing energy levels, and speeding up recovery rates. It's no wonder athletes who use it have such of an edge over those who do not. Soon Optimum Nutrition is confident that nearly every athlete who competes will use it (if they don't already). Creatine's ability to enhance energy reserves in muscles comes from its muscle protein synthesizing action, while minimizing protein breakdown. This occurs because creatine has the awesome effect of super-hydrating muscle cells with water. It enhances muscles' growth too, making muscle fibres bigger and stronger.
 
Glutamine is in high demand throughout the body. It is used in the gut and immune system extensively to maintain optimal performance. 60% of free-form amino acids floating in skeletal muscles is L-glutamine. L-glutamine plays a very important role in protein metabolism, and it appears to be a very important nutrient for body builders. When supplemented, it may help bodybuilders reduce the amount of muscle deterioration that occurs because other tissues that need glutamine will not rob the glutamine stored in the muscle cells

CLA (Conjugated Linoleic Acid) is quickly becoming a "must have" for people who are looking to lose fat and gain muscle. Each softgel contains 1000 mg of CLA One® that yields 750 mg total CLA and 700 mg of active isomers.

Controlled scientific studies have shown that supplementing with CLA may favourably affect body composition. Scientists hypothesize that CLA, possibly acting to enhance metabolic activity at the cellular membrane level, may allow those who exercise, supplement with CLA, and follow a healthy lifestyle to lose fat and gain muscle definition faster.

Optimum Nutrition's CLA delivers CLA One Brand Conjugated Linoleic Acid. One Softgel delivers the same amount of CLA contained in 6 lbs of beef or 50 Slices of cheese!

description:
Optimum Nutrition's BCAA 5000 Powder provides a 5000 mg blend of the three Branched Chain Amino Acids (L-Valine, L-Leucine and L-Isoleucine) in every serving. The Branched Chain Amino Acids (BCAA's), so named because of their unique branched chemical structure, are essential in that the body cannot make them from other compounds. In recent times, these amino acids have been investigated for their potential anticatabolic (preventing muscle breakdown) and anabolic (muscle building) effects.

name: 100% Casein Protein 908g
description:
Sometimes slower is better - especially when it comes to the rate of protein digestion. While rapid protein absorption is desirable immediately before or after exercise, delayed release is probably more beneficial throughout the remainder of the day.

Casein proteins are pH sensitive and gel in the acidic environment of the stomach. As a result, it can take more than twice as long for caseins to be broken-down into their amino acid subcomponents than whey and other proteins. Because of their unique time-released qualities, caseins are aptly described as anti-catabolic or muscle-protecting proteins.

name: Whey Isolate 5kg
description:
Whey Protein Isolate is considered to be the most nutritionally complete protein available to athletes and body builders. It’s easily absorbed for rapid conversion to muscle tissue. It is also low fat, low lactose and low in calories. It has a high biological value which means more of the protein is retained by the body to be converted to muscle. NutriSport's Whey Protein Isolate is no less than 84% protein and has added L-glutamine for more efficient recovery of muscle tissue. It undergoes no heat treatment; therefore the protein is un-denatured and retains its nutrients.

name: Weight Gainer 5kg
description:
To gain weight you need to increase your daily food intake with good nutrition. Protein and carbohydrates are the key nutrients in weight gaining and achieving a ‘toned’ look. A good daily diet is important and should be supplemented at least 3 times per day with a nutritious drink (between meals). The extra protein and carbohydrate (not fat and refined sugar) will enable your body to gain weight healthily. Weight Gain is ideal for those with a fast metabolism or lean physique who find it difficult to ‘bulk up’ with their normal calorie intake. Most of the energy comes from carbohydrates and protein rather than fat (35% protein, 50% carbs, 4% fat). 9g Creatine and 18g BCAA’s per daily serving.

name: 90+ Protein 5kg
description:
The protein requirements of athletes is approximately 1.2-1.8g/kg body weight, compared with 0.8-0.9g/kg body weight for less active individuals. For heavy athletes this extra requirement is especially important. Muscle mass is increased by the rate of anabolism and destroyed by the rate of catabolism during exercise.

The whey protein in Nutrisport 90+ Protein is absorbed quickly, having a very high biological value and an anabolic effect that lasts a couple of hours. The Micellar Casein in 90+ Protein is absorbed much more slowly, giving a sustained anti-catabolic action. It has therefore been recommended to take Whey Protein Isolate in the morning, and Micellar Casein but not any denatured casein last thing at night. So Nutrisport 90+ provides the best of both for muscle growth at any time of the day or night.

• Calorie Free sweetener (aspartame free)

• Low in fat and carbohydrate

• Supports muscle growth/reduces muscle breakdown

• High BV Whey Protein Isolate

• Slow Digest Micellar Casein

• Quick but prolonged release of amino acids to muscles

• Highest Protein Percentage of any Protein in it's class

From the Nutrex Underground comes the meanest, most powerful, monstrous lean muscle generating protein to ever surface: Muscle Infusion Black. This daring formula is a unique blend of seven multi-functional protein fractions. This powerful protein blend is fast-acting yet long-lasting. It triggers a quick anabolic onslaught followed by sustained muscle-building activities. Upon ingestion, its multi-layered protein fractions go to work. Are there any stimulants or caffeine in Muscle Infusion Black?
No. Muscle Infusion Black does not contain any stimulants or caffeine.

Can Muscle Infusion Black be taken with other supplements?
Absolutely! Muscle Infusion Black can be taken with any other supplement. If your goal is to maximize muscle and strength gains, you may also combine Muscle Infusion Black with our powerful underground testosterone booster T-UP Black. description:
Mutant Mass was developed following several years of research and is based on sound, proven science. More importantly though, the finished Mutant Mass formula was also tested in the gym, where it was put through its paces by real life bodybuilders and strength athletes.

Mutant Mass is all about gaining rock hard muscle - and lots of it! Building muscle requires the right protein mix to expand the muscle tissue and repair it fast. The protein must also be spared from being wasted for the body's energy needs, while the muscle also requires massive infusions of clean calories to replace glycogen used up during training. Digestion, absorption, triggering calorie uptake and manipulating protein sequencing - the Mutant Mass formula takes all that into account and hits a home run like nothing else you've ever tried!

With every conceivable form of the highest-quality proteins available, healthy “fat burning” fats and low GI, slow-burning carbs and gut healthy fibres, this is truly the most thoughtfully-designed lean mass gainer formula in the history of bodybuilding!

name: Casein 1.4kg
description:
MusclePharm’s Core Series Casein helps contribute to the development of muscle mass and recovery. Consuming the right protein in optimum quantities can be difficult. This is why harder-training individuals often turn to protein powders.
 
In the protein world, casein is a specialized protein that needs to be utilized correctly in order to be effective. As a slow-digesting nutrient, it can work at night while you are asleep. Take before bed, and it nourishes your muscles after you’ve called it a day.
 
MusclePharm know you push your body to the limit—then you keep pushing. This is why our protein powder is hard at work even when you’re not. Since day one, MP’s goal has been to deliver superior products. With Casein Protein, you get a sustained, slow release of protein and amino acids. You may not eat for hours, but this MP Casein protein helps ensure your muscles are getting fed and getting fed well. MusclePharm use only the highest quality of micellar casein—as they believe that this is the best sustained protein available. Combined with their digestive enzyme and probiotic blend, they’re intent on setting new standards in the arena of casein protein.
 
If you’re serious, you know the importance of sleep. Now, with MP’s Casein Core, you refuel and feed your muscles with one of the best casein protein products on the market.
