name: Assault 736g
description:
The athlete’s choice for pre-performance
Trusted by NFL players, UFC competitors and bodybuilders for pre-performance supplementation,
Assault provides bodybuilders, powerlifters, fighters and strength athletes with a pre- and intra- workout powerhouse that promotes levels of performance that help you bust through plateaus. Consume Assault prior to training, or sip on it during the first part of your workout. From your first serving onward, you may experience a performance-boosting surge.
 
Con-Cret: MusclePharm were the first to offer this patented version of creatine in a pre-workout product.
 
Astragin: A patented, clinically-studied ginseng extract, Astragin may help support the absorption of many nutrients.
 
Cinnulin: Like Astragin, Cinnulin helps support absorption, so the creatine, arginine, vitamins and other proven ingredients in Assault can get into your muscles.
 
BCAAs: Unlike "concentrated" formulas that hit hard, then leave you hanging like you just got mugged in a dark alley... Assault is there from start to finish. The BCAA in the formula is a patent-pending 3:1:2 ratio which is higher in leucine and valine than isoleucine. The addition of these amino acids promotes recovery and supports lean muscle mass.
 
No 1,3-Dimethylamine: Athletes need a complete formula. Not a stimulant.
 
The Complete Package: 4g beta alanine, 5g of Con-Cret & Creapure creatine, 1.5g citrulline malate, 6g BCAA, carbohydrates, vitamins, and of course MusclePharm’s special high performance energy & intensity amplifier blend - all of this in every scoop.

name: Carnivor Mass 2.5kg
description:
Beef has proven itself as a favourite anabolic protein source for many champion bodybuilders. MuscleMeds advanced hydrolyzed Beef Protein Isolate is capable of delivering rapid absorption of high concentrations of amino acids fast. Carnivor Mass provides the mass building benefits of beef “at the speed of whey,” without the lactose, allergies, fat, cholesterol and other problems associated with dairy products. MuscleMeds BPI is 350% more concentrated in amino acids than steak and more concentrated than whey. And it’s enhanced with 5 grams of creatine and additional BCAAs for even greater anabolic power!
 
Did you know that when you drink calories rather than chew them, you skip the important first step of carbohydrate digestion and bypass carbohydrate digesting enzymes secreted into your saliva? This fact has been totally neglected by makers of conventional mass gainers. It can result in a delay in caloric absorption. iSpike addresses this problem with a natural system of amylases that slices through every carbohydrate particle in its path. iSpike enzymes act on straight chains of glucose molecules as well as at branch points. This encourages insulin release amplification that wouldn’t be possible with regular foods or garden-variety mass gainers.

name: Carnivor 1800g
description:
The world's first all beef protein isolate is more concentrated than whey
Using new advanced extraction, clarification, hydrolysis and isolation technologies Carnivor's Beef Protein Isolate delivers the muscle-building power of beef with higher amino acid levels than all other protein sources used in supplements including: whey, soy, milk and egg. Carnivor Beef Protein Isolate is even 350% more concentrated in anabolic muscle-building aminos than a prime sirloin steak!

Anabolic Nitrogen Retention Technology (ARNT) recycles aminos and minimizes ammonia
ANRT is a major muscle-building breakthrough in protein supplementation. While protein is critical for muscle growth, paradoxically, protein can sometimes actually decrease performance and muscle growth if nitrogenous waste products like ammonia are not recycled back into anabolic tissue-building pathways or otherwise neutralized. ANRT is specially designed to allow the recycling of aminos back toward the muscle building pathway and prevent the build-up of debilitating toxic scavengers such as ammonia. ANRT nitrogen retention factors contained in Carnivor include: GKG (glutamine-alpha-ketoglutarate), OKG (ornithine-alpha-ketoglutarate), AKG (alpha-ketoglutarate) and KIC (alpha-ketoisocaproate).

20-times the creatine content of steak
One of the attributes of eating beef is its naturally high creatine content. Beef is one of the best natural sources of creatine. To push the anabolic activation and cell volumizing effects of creatine even greater, each serving of Carnivor supplies 20 times more creatine than whole beef food sources to saturate your muscles for explosive strength and growth.

Added BCAA for increased anabolic and anti-catabolic effects
To further boost the anabolic, muscle-building action of Carnivor, additional Branch Chain Amino Acids are added to the purified Beef Protein Isolate. The enhanced BCAA levels promote a positive nitrogen balance, increase protein synthesis, decrease catabolism, improve workout performance and reduce muscle fatigue.

name: Carnivor 908g
description:
The world's first all beef protein isolate is more concentrated than whey
Using new advanced extraction, clarification, hydrolysis and isolation technologies Carnivor's Beef Protein Isolate delivers the muscle-building power of beef with higher amino acid levels than all other protein sources used in supplements including: whey, soy, milk and egg. Carnivor Beef Protein Isolate is even 350% more concentrated in anabolic muscle-building aminos than a prime sirloin steak!

Anabolic Nitrogen Retention Technology (ARNT) recycles aminos and minimizes ammonia
ANRT is a major muscle-building breakthrough in protein supplementation. While protein is critical for muscle growth, paradoxically, protein can sometimes actually decrease performance and muscle growth if nitrogenous waste products like ammonia are not recycled back into anabolic tissue-building pathways or otherwise neutralized. ANRT is specially designed to allow the recycling of aminos back toward the muscle building pathway and prevent the build-up of debilitating toxic scavengers such as ammonia. ANRT nitrogen retention factors contained in Carnivor include: GKG (glutamine-alpha-ketoglutarate), OKG (ornithine-alpha-ketoglutarate), AKG (alpha-ketoglutarate) and KIC (alpha-ketoisocaproate).

20-times the creatine content of steak
One of the attributes of eating beef is its naturally high creatine content. Beef is one of the best natural sources of creatine. To push the anabolic activation and cell volumizing effects of creatine even greater, each serving of Carnivor supplies 20 times more creatine than whole beef food sources to saturate your muscles for explosive strength and growth.

Added BCAA for increased anabolic and anti-catabolic effects
To further boost the anabolic, muscle-building action of Carnivor, additional Branch Chain Amino Acids are added to the purified Beef Protein Isolate. The enhanced BCAA levels promote a positive nitrogen balance, increase protein synthesis, decrease catabolism, improve workout performance and reduce muscle fatigue.

name: Amino Decanate 360g
description:
Amino Decanate: MuscleMeds newest scientifically advanced amino acid formula is designed to trigger maximum anabolic effects and prevent rate limiting amino acid deficiencies and catabolism often experienced during intense workouts. New research shows that while BCAAs and glutamine are the major players in muscle growth, 15 other amino acids known as Critical Core Amino Acids (CCAAs) also play a critical role. In fact, once you are depleted of any of these aminos your muscle growth and performance comes to a screeching halt. This phenomenon is known as the "Rate Limiting Amino Acid Factor." Each serving of Amino Decanate provides all 19 critical amino acids for peak muscle building, maximum performance and optimal recovery. To enhance the bio-availability and potency of this already highly anabolic formula, Amino Decanate features MuscleMeds exclusive DecaDrive Delivery Technology!

name: L-Glutamine Powder 300g
description:
L-Glutamine is the most abundant of free amino acids in muscle tissue. It makes up the majority of the amino acids in muscle tissues and is vitally important for protein metabolism around the body.

In addition to being incorporated into structural proteins, like muscle fibres, glutamine also acts as a precursor to other amino acids, a raw material that is important to the function of a number of systems in the body. This role as a raw material means ensuring sufficient intake for the athlete as when supplies are low the body will take glutamine from the muscle tissue to supply needs.

Good digestive health supports the immune system and ensures that the protein and other nutrients found in the diet are well absorbed. As well as it‘s role in muscle metabolism L-glutamine has also been shown to improve the health and function of the gut, feeding and supporting the cells lining the gut. Our Glutamine has nothing but 100% of the pure amino acid in its highest quality form. With no additives this allows for the greatest flexibility and ease of use both as a stand alone or in shakes or on food.

Benefits:
Protects muscle proteins from being broken down by the catabolic process triggered by intensive training
Supports muscle recovery and refuelling
Supports gut function from better digestion
Potent muscle cell volumiser

Ingredients
L-Glutamine (100%). May contain traces of Milk Protein, Soya and Egg.

Suitable for Vegetarians

Energy 84kJ/19kcal
Protein 5g
Carbohydrate 0g
Fat 0g
L-Glutamine 5g

Mix one 5g serving with 100 ml of water and take one serving daily, before or after training and with breakfast on non-training days.
Caution: Do not exceed the recommended daily dose. 
Keep out of children‘s reach.

name: Glucosamine Chondroitin 120ct
description:
Weight training places a lot of stress on the muscles, tendons and in particular the tissues found within the joints. The articular cartilage is the glossy smooth tissue found where bone meets bone and helps with the aid of the synovial fluid to lubricate the joint. It is very important for proper function of the joint, when damaged occurs, hardcore training is near impossible. Heavy training year in year out can cause wear and tear in this cartilage but these connective tissues found in the joint capsule are poorly supplied with minimal blood flow going near them, this means a lower rate on nutrient and a slower rate of recovery, even in the healthiest individuals. The PROFESSIONAL range joint support formula has been designed with total joint health in mind, getting to the problem of poor joint health form a variety of different angles. Glucosamine is an amino sugar and chondroitin is a glycosaminoglycan, together they make up a significant portion of the connective tissue, ensuring proper function and reducing pain from damage or years of hard work.

Benefits:
Joint Support Formula
Glucosamine and Chondroitin are important for people with strong abrasion of the joints through exercise
Glucosamine Sulphate is effective iin the production of collagen, the natural cushion in cartilage
Glucosamine and Chondroitin combined are believed to be most effective in helping to renew and repair collagen and maintain the lubricating properties of fluids around joints

Ingredients:
Glucosamine Sulphate, Chondroitin Sulphate, Gelatin (capsule), Nettle Leaf Extract, Zinc Gluconate, Vitamin C (as Ascorbic Acid), CRA (Curcumin Extract), Anti-Caking Agents:
Magnesium Stearate and Silicon Dioxide, Vitamin E (as Dl-Alpha-Tocopheryl Acetate), Colours: Titanium Dioxide and Quinoline Yellow, Sodium Selenite, Manganese(II) Sulphate, Vitamin B6 (as Pyridoxine HCl).

Nutrition Information per 4 capsules
Glucosamine 1500mg
Chondroitin  800mg
Nettle Leaf Extract 450mg
Curcumin Extract 50mg

Take 2x2 capsules per day with a glass of water.  2 doses spread throughout the day. Do not exceed the daily dose. Keep out of reach of children.

name: BCAA Powder 400g
description:
Amino acids are essential for muscle gain as they form the building blocks of muscle fibre. But not all amino acids have the same function or effect upon the body when eaten. The Branch Chain Amino Acid‘s or BCAA‘s are a group of three amino acids that punch well above their weight in terms of muscle building nutrition actually stimulating the production of new protein within the muscle cell, in effect creating more muscle by themselves. This drug-like anabolic property is not only great for gaining muscle but for recovery from intense training and for safeguarding muscle whilst training.

Due to their use in medicine for muscle wasting conditions, we know this muscle protein synthesis is driven via the m-TOR pathway and of the three branch chain amino acids L-Leucine L-Valine, L-Isoleucine, the amino acid Leucine has been shown to be the major driver of this pathway. The PROFESIONAL line contains the amino acids in a 2:1:1 ratio meaning an ample supply of the most anabolic: Leucine.

In addition to laying down more muscle, BCAA‘s can also be used for energy within the muscle cell which spares your precious muscle protein from being broken down for energy. The combination of anabolic and anticatabolic properties makes it the perfect supplement when you‘re dieting hard, allowing you to lose fat whilst retaining that hard earned muscle mass.

Benefits:
Potent anabolic amino acid formula
Stimulates the production of new muscle tissue
Provides a source of energy for intense training

Ingredients
Branched Chain Amino Acids (30% L-Leucine, 15% L-Valine, 15% L-Isoleucine), Bulking Agent Erythritol, Acidifi er Citric Acid, Acidity Regulator Trisodium
Citrate, Flavour, Sweeteners: Acesulfame-K and Sucralose, Anti-Caking Agent Silicon Dioxide, Colour E122*. May contain traces of Egg and Soya.

Suitable for Vegetarians

name: Creatine Powder 450g
description:
Strength athletes have known about the advantages of creatine supplementation for decades now; it is simply one of the most ergogenic supplements available to the weightlifter. It‘s role is to act as a carrier and of the basic unit of energy in the cell, the phosphate ion, carrying and supplying these to the cellular energy molecule ATP levels. For the bodybuilder creatine supplementation means increased performance. Simply put: more weight lifted for more reps. This extra work means more stimulation and adaptation and this means one thing more hypertrophy.

As well as working in the supply chain that provides energy for muscular contraction creatine performs other roles, research shows that it supports the production of muscle tissue and also sucks water into the muscle cell meaning greater cell hydration, important for better performance and also faster recovery as well as giving fuller look to the whole physique.

Whilst creatine supplements are common it is very important to keep in mind that not all creatines and creatine supplements are the same. Our Creatine is nothing but 100% Creapure creatine, the global gold standard in terms of quality and efficiency.

Benefits:
Simply one of the most ergogenic supplements available for weightlifters
For the bodybuilder creatine supplementation means increased performance
More weight lifted for more reps
Professional  Creatine is nothing but 100% Creapure creatine, the global gold standard in terms of quality and efficacy

name: ZMA 90ct
description:
ZMA is a unique, university-tested, patent-pending anabolic mineral support formula containing highly bio available forms of Zinc and Magnesium as Zinc L-Monomethionine and covalently-bound Zinc / Magnesium Aspartate. ZMA is an advanced formulation designed to significantly enhance strength, endurance, healing, recovery and growth. Zinc is an anabolic element and promotes healing, tissue repair and muscle growth. Zinc also increases the effect of growth hormone and testosterone. The body’s maximum daily release of growth hormone occurs about 90 minutes after going to sleep. Both zinc and magnesium increase the effect of growth hormone.

name: HMB 120ct
description:
Met-Rx Hardcore HMB is a metabolite of the essential amino acid leucine. As with other amino acid related substances, HMB appears to play a role in the synthesis of protein - particularly the protein that builds new muscle. Research suggests that HMB may improve the growth of lean muscle tissue.

One study involving 28 individuals undergoing a regular weight training programme found that supplementing with 3g of HMB per day compared to no supplementation, contributed to greater gains of muscle over a 7 week period. Studies also show that HMB lowers both total and LDL cholesterol (‘bad’ cholesterol) while increasing ‘good’ HDL cholesterol. These effects were noted in individuals taking no exercise, however in those taking regular exercise the effects were much greater.

For adults, take four (4) capsules three times daily with a meal. Do not exceed recommended dose.

description:
Inner Armour Creatine Monohydrate is in the metabolically efficient micronized form. This extraordinary processing technique of micronizing the creatine crystal into an ultra fine powder maximizes the ability of this powder substance to remain suspended in liquid for longer periods of time, and maximizes absorption into the blood stream after ingestion.

Inner Armour Creatine Monohydrate is the purest creatine available. Creatine products identified with the AllPure symbol of quality are independently analyzed for purity - Guaranteed free of impurities.

Creatine Monohydrate is an essential and proven aid to muscle building and training programs. Helping to increase workout performance and intensity this ergogenic aid is a proven basic element to every successful bodybuilding supplement program.

• Proven to increase muscle mass, strength and exercise performance

• Dramatic gains in size and strength within a short duration

• “AllPure” brand creatine, which means free of impurities

description:
New Lean Muscle Series, Inner Armour Whey Protein is an advanced clinically formulated whey protein. This formula makes it the perfect addition to your diet to help include muscle-building proteins and potentially satisfy cravings, increase energy levels and maintain overall health. For maximum effectiveness, this formula has been enhanced with free form the amino acids L-glycine and L-taurine and with whey protein hydrolysate. Studies strongly suggest that the ingestion of a fast-acting protein/amino acid hydrolysate supplement can increase amino acid levels in systemic circulation. The more rapidly these amino acids rise in the blood, the greater the anabolic muscle building reaction. Hydrolysates like the ones found in Inner Armour Whey Protein have been shown to be the most beneficial form for bodybuilders and athletes as they absorb the fastest and therefore create the greatest spike in plasma concentration.

name: Amino 2000 500ct
description:
Amino acids are the building blocks of protein in the body. Amino acids are essential for the synthesis of structural proteins like muscle tissue, organs, skin and hair; enzymes; some hormones; and neurotransmitters. Amino acids are also involved in numerous metabolic pathways that affect exercise metabolism.

Amino 2000 provides a complete spectrum of rapidly assimilated nitrogen-rich protein peptides and fractions essential to muscular development. Provided in calibrated dosages these nutrients provide targeted anabolic/anti-catabolic support to the hard trained muscle integrity.

Amino 2000 is the perfect protein supplement when versatility, efficiency, and mobility are issues for athletes. Super fortify your meals and beverages with these power-packed amino tablets. Anytime, anywhere you have the power of protein at your fingertips.

name: Ration Pack 120ct
description:
Grenade Ration Pack is a complete, daily food supplement, designed to provide comprehensive nutritional support to hard-training athletes and military personnel. Grenade believe that Ration Pack provides the ideal ratios and dosages of quality vitamins, minerals, trace elements, phytonutrients, essential fatty acids and probiotics required to create the best foundation for muscle growth, repair and overall health. 

The key to Grenade Ration Pack is that it is a ‘Full Spectrum’, daily nutritional supplement that contains everything you need in one convenient, ‘tear off’ strip. Anyone can put together a basic multi-vitamin/mineral supplement with decent levels of all of the basic micronutrients that the body requires but some people want more and some people require more. Let’s face it, athletes, fitness professionals and military personnel ask more of their bodies, creating muscular and oxidative stress and potentially increasing many of their nutritional requirements. Also, it is well-established that there is a lot more to ‘complete’ nutrition than just getting all of your vitamins.
 
So far beyond the basics and even several steps beyond sophisticated ‘multi’ products, with Grenade Ration Pack, you get a variety of research-studied nutrient constituents, along with concentrated, ‘superfood’ extracts. So if you want a truly comprehensive formula, with everything you need in one box, that is packaged in convenient tear-off strips that are perfect to carry around to the gym or even when deployed on operations, then Grenade Ration Pack is the only product that ticks all the boxes.
 
*Based upon European Food Safety Authority approved Nutrition and Health Claims.

name: Thermo Detonator
description:
Grenade Thermo Detonator is a weight-management product that combines perfectly with your high-protein, calorie controlled diet and exercise routine to “declare war on fat”! 

Grenade combines the highest quality, maximum potency ingredients to help support a metabolic rate and a level of appetite that could naturally support fat metabolism and weight management. With a massive 500mg of Green Tea extract per serving, Grenade packs just about the biggest punch in the industry with regard to this proven ingredient. Carefully processed green tea extracts contain specific levels of molecules called “catechins” – these are chemical polyphenols that have been shown to have positive effects on body weight and measurements and to have strong antioxidant and health-supportive properties. 

This makes the Grenade formula just about as powerful as it can possibly be while maintaining its classification as a food supplement and without crossing the line into having significant drug-like effects. So if you want the highest and most potent dosages of the most important weight loss support ingredients all in one product, no product declares war on fat like Grenade!

name: AT4 120ct
description:
Introducing Grenade AT4, designed to deliver hormonal support and Anabolic Devastation! AT4 has been formulated by the multi award winning sports nutrition specialists at Grenade to support your body’s anabolic environment. Let’s face it, to achieve maximum strength and muscle mass, it’s not enough to just hit the weights hard and get in all of your calories and protein, you need to achieve the right hormonal balance to ensure that you recover from all of that hard training and that all of that nutrition is directed to muscular recovery and repair!
 
AT4 contains the latest, research-tested ingredients, delivered in clinically-tested dosages, so that you can be sure that you’ve left no stone unturned when it comes to providing your body with all of the crucial factors that could support muscle mass, recovery and muscle pumps! Crucially, Grenade AT4 is manufactured using Rapid Dispersal Capsule technology to ensure fast and complete delivery of AT4’s high-quality, nutraceutical payload into your digestive tract and ultimately, your muscles!
 
In formulating AT4, the Grenade research team looked at every major hormone-support product that has been formulated over the last ten years. Next they looked at all of the science that has evaluated potential hormone support ingredients. Then they discarded all of the obsolete ingredients that didn’t meet our exacting standards for effectiveness and only included the most potentially powerful candidate ingredients.
 
The result is AT4, which contains research tested dosages of D-Aspartic Calcium Chelate, Trade Marked Fenurex, Passiflora Caerulea, Boric Acid and mega-dose Vitamin D3.

Take 1 serving (3 capsules), twice daily - 30 minutes prior to breakfast and 30 minutes prior to lunch OR take 2 servings (6 capsules) first thing in the morning, 30 minutes prior to breakfast. When you push yourself to the limit, your muscles pay the price. AminoLast with AmmoJect technology is the only product that delivers a high dose of BCAAs, powerful Leucine-enriched peptide amino acids, anti-cramping electrolytes and AmmoJect, to rid your muscles of waste products that can cause fatigue. name: Extreme Mass 4.5kg
description:
Extreme Nutrition have carefully chosen ingredients which should not lead to the fat storage usually associated with this genre of products. The protein is from milk and high-quality whey concentrate and the carbohydrates are from fructose (as a sweetner), maltodextrin (the industry standard carb source in mass building products) and oat flour. Oat flour has a low glycaemic index and so is unlikely to cause dramatic fluctuations in insulin and blood sugar that can lead to fat gains. Oat flour is also rich in fibre, which is often just about absent in most supplements.

This formula is designed to cause a slow and sustained release of nutrients to the bloodstream which will not cause large insulin fluctuations which lead to fat storage. The time release absorption principle also means the body has more time to absorb the nutrients and get them to the parts of the body where they are required.

Many companies are now promoting new creatine formulas or versions of creatine claiming it is the next big thing, but with no real scientific evidence.

Amino acids are what the body breaks protein down into after we eat it, there are 22 of them present in the human body but very few solid foods offer the full range of aminos, this is where Extreme Aminos come in. Designed to be taken with solid protein sources like fish or poultry to improve the amino acid profile of the protein.

Extreme Aminos are a convenient easy to carry protein source which requires no mixing, perfect for keeping in the car or a drawer at work so your body needs never end up in a catabolic state through not having access to easy to take protein.

Dorian Yates NOX Pump is a dietary supplement indicated for athletes seeking to maximize their psychological, cardiovascular & muscular performance during training.

Dorian Yates is Britain's most successful ever bodybuilder, a former 6-time Mr. Olympia, respected around the world for his knowledge of training and nutrition. Dorian’s uncompromising personality and training philosophies forever changed the sport of bodybuilding.

NOXPump was developed by his scientific panel of PhDs, nutritionists and technical consultants. Dorian has supervised the entire process so you can be assured that NOX Pump is designed to deliver increased energy, motivation, strength, power, endurance and muscle pumps during training. CNP Professional's Pro-Ms is a unique protein meal replacement formulated to meet the specific requirements of women. The carbohydrates are low glycemic in nature and have been incorporated to assist in keeping insulin and blood sugar levels constant, preventing accumulation of body fat.

The healthy fat sources included in Pro-Ms have been incorporated to play an important role - sunflower, flax seed oil and CLA are health promoting essential fatty acids (EFA's) also shown to aid body fat reduction. To further enhance the thermogenic effect (fat loss) of the EFA's, green tea extract, raspberry ketone and maitake mushroom extract have been added, which also have antioxidant properties that could be of long term benefit to women.

Pro-Ms contains added vitamins and minerals as well as probiotics, which are friendly bacteria found in the intestines to aid intestinal health which further help utilise the high quality ingredients contained in Pro-Ms. Pro-Ms is the first and only low calorie, high quality meal replacement on the market specifically designed for women today.

name: Pro-Mass 4.5kg
description:
CNP Professional's Pro-Mass is not to be confused with cheap weight-gain powders, this is a scientific approach to gaining lean muscle mass for those with a fast metabolism or poor appetite. Pro-Mass contains a proprietary blend of undenatured proteins in the form of filterated whey and micellar casein with complex carbohydrates. It is low in saturated fat and lactose thus making it easier to digest. Pro-Mass can assist with supporting protein synthesis whilst reducing protein breakdown, due to it's optimum blend of fast and slow release protein.

Consuming six meals a day has been the standard practice when trying to add muscle mass, but for many people eating six solid meals daily can be difficult. Pro-Mass is an ideal solution when trying to meet the target of consuming six meals a day by simply replacing a solid meal. Pro-Mass Contains:

Maltodextrin - An easily digestible form of carbohydrate made from natural corn starch. Maltodextrin is the preferred carbohydrate used in energy foods due to its solubility, neutral taste profile, and quick absorption.

Fibre - An indigestible carbohydrate, which passes through the digestive system relatively unchanged and is considered essential for good gut function.

Cold-processed Whey Protein Concentrate - CNP's whey protein has been cold processed to retain key fractions in their native states that may be affected by other processing methods.

Micellar Casein - This is a premium form of Casein that has anti-catabolic effects, due to its slow uptake from the gut. This allows for a constant flow of amino acids to be on hand for the muscle to repair and grow.

Medium Chain Triglycerides (MCT) - Medium chain triglycerides are easier to digest and more readily used for energy than other fats.

Container Size: 4500g 
Serving Size: 4 scoops (100g) 
Servings Per Container: 45    

Amount Per Serving: 
Total Calories: 394 
Protein: 35g 
Total Carbohydrates: 53g 
-Sugars: 6.7g 
-Dietary Fiber: 4g 
Fat: 4.7g 
-Saturates: 1.7g 
-MCTs: 3g 
Sodium: 0.03g 

Ingredients: 
Maltodextrin, cold processed whey protein concentrate, Micellar undenatured casein, medium-chain triglycerides, flavouring (chocolate), stabiliser (xanthan gum), sweetener (sucralose) 

Mix 2-4 scoops of ProMass in 568ml of cold water or skimmed milk. To be consumed 1-3 times daily in between or in place of a meal.

name: Pro Lean Whey 2kg
description:
CNP Pro Lean Whey is a premium quality, high protein meal replacement drink, designed to help you to manage your weight loss goals. It provides you with your protein needs and has added ingredients to support your lean, fit look at any time of the day!
 
Pro Lean Whey is low in fat & sugar (1g of sugar & fat in a 25g serving) and contains the whey proteins known to stimulate muscle protein synthesis; assisting in helping you with your lean muscle growth and recovery after exercise.
 
CNP Professional’s Pro Lean Whey contains a full range of amino acids and is particularly high in the Branch Chain Amino Acids (BCAA’s) and glutamine, the most abundant amino acid found in muscle. At CNP we have also researched and included ingredients that may help with your weight loss goals and healthy lifestyle aspirations. Some of these ingredients include: CLA (Conjugated linoleic Acid), Flaxseed Powder, Waxy Barley Starch and Green Tea Extract.

name: Pro-Lean SF 90ct
description:
Today, more and more people are aware of the dangers of obesity. The best way to avoid bodyfat accumulation is to adhere to a healthy balanced diet and incorporate some regular form of exercise.

When added to this equation, CNP Professional's Pro-Lean can assist in the quest for a leaner appearance. Pro-Lean contains a powerful blend of active natural ingredients that may support the optimal metabolic rate and energy levels necessary to achieve this goal. Pro Lean may also control cravings and encourage a regular eating pattern.

name: Pro-HMB 120ct
description:
HMB is a metabolite of the branch chain amino acid (BCAA) leucine, which is a natural compound produced in very small amounts by the body. Pro-HMB is of the purest natural source and research has shown that HMB may assist in preventing catabolism (muscle breakdown), which can often occur when performing intense forms of exercise. Hindering any catabolic (muscle breakdown) effects means the body will simply be placed in a better position for muscle growth. Research has demonstrated that an intake of 3grams a day of HMB to be most effective. Ideal times to take Pro-HMB are 1.5g (3 capsules) immediately before and after exercise. On non-training days space intake of 3 grams evenly throughout the day.

Container Size: 120 capsules

Serving Size: 6 Capsules

Servings Per Container: 20

Amount Per Serving:

Beta-Hydroxy-Beta-Methylbutyrate: 3000mg

Non-training days: take 3 capsules twice per day.

Training days: take three capsules before training and three capsules immediately after training

name: Pro-CLA 1000mg
description:
CLA (conjugated linoleic acid) is a specific fat and the richest source available derives from Safflower oil. The benefits of Pro-CLA may include reductions in body fat whilst helping to retain lean muscle tissue. Pro-CLA contains only the original patent-protected material and is provided as clear capsules, so that you may see that it is pure and devoid of any sediment. Pro-CLA is produced from Safflower oil and has over 80% total CLA content, the highest on the market, so that you may realise the scientifically-proven benefits of using the correct material. Pro-CLA Contains Conjugated Linoleic Acid (80%) - a polyunsaturated fat derived from safflower oil.

Branched-chain amino acids (BCAA) are believed to enhance exercise endurance and performance, through a reduction in central fatigue. An associated positive change in hormone status and physiology may lead to improved lean body mass and protection against muscle damage.

CNP Professional aim to produce the highest quality, cost effective formulas that will aid elite athletes and general gym users alike to achieve their physical goals when combined with regular exercise and healthy diet. CNP Professional is a brand chosen by top athletes in boxing, rugby, football, bodybuilding and powerlifting. name: True Mass 2.6 kg
description:
BSN's True Mass is a macronutrient-heavy lean mass gainer tailored specifically towards people looking for the additional caloric support necessary to maximize lean muscle mass gains, and for individuals that require a heightened level of nutrients owing to a higher metabolic rate. True Mass contains a multi-functional AM to PM protein blend that feeds your muscles for up to 8 hours, a blend of complex carbohydrates that provides useable energy for your muscular frame, along with Medium Chain Triglycerides (MCTs) and Essential Fatty Acids (EFAs) for heart health and hormonal support. Further fortifying True Mass is the addition of Branched Chain Amino Acids (BCAA's) for positive nitrogen balance, fiber for nutrient uptake, glutamine peptides for recovery and glutamine alpha ketoglutarate for maximal anti-catabolic effects. Other highlights of BSN's True Mass include:

description:
BSN's Syntha-6 is an ultra-premium protein that tastes 'ridiculously' delicious! This multi-functional AM to PM protein powder contains 6 individually complete proteins, each with varying digestive rates and distinct amino acid profiles. This combination ensures that your muscles are fed for up to 8 hours with the highest quality combination of proteins available in the world. To enhance this ultra-premium blend, Syntha-6 has also been fortified with BCAA's, muscle-sparing glutamine peptides, Aminogen for greater digestion, heart-healthy medium chain triglycerides (MCTs) and essential fatty acids, along with 5 grams of fiber for improved digestion and increased nutrient uptake. name: Nitrix
description:
BSN's Nitrix is what’s called an AM to PM vaso-muscular dilator. This product works by expanding your blood vessels, which acts to increase blood flow, oxygen and nutrient delivery to your muscle cells. By ensuring the efficient travel of blood and nutrients throughout the body, you will experience improved workout performance, amazing pumps, all-day muscle fullness and vascularity, greater energy, a heightened resistance to fatigue and a greater ability to recover. Nitrix is the foundation to all of your supplementation needs. Live for the pump!

name: Critical Mass 4.4kg
description:
Looking to gain Muscle Size and Strength, quickly? Look no further, the answer has arrived!  Critical Mass contains 52 grams of the highest biological value proteins per serving. These will provide the building blocks for your muscle tissue. It also contains a precise ratio of complex and fast acting Carbohydrates. Consuming enough Carbohydrates is essential and will prevent you from losing muscle tissue. This makes Critical Mass ideal for any individual needing a high Carbohydrate meal during the day or after a tough training session.

Critical Mass also contains a blend of Essential Fatty Acids, Medium Chain Triglycerides and CLA. This blend of “Super Fats” has been designed to give your body the tools that it needs to recover from intense physical exercise. Critical Mass should be used by:

• Individuals wanting a calorie dense body mass gain formula

• “Hard-gainers” that struggle to put on weight (People with a High metabolic rate)

• Strength athletes, bodybuilders & weight-lifters

• High energy athletes such as rugby players, boxers, wrestlers etc

• Anyone wanting to “bulk-up”, gain muscle weight, or improve all-round athletic performance

• Aerobic athletes wanting to build muscle or increase strength

So if you’re looking to gain muscle size and strength quickly, order your supply of Applied Nutrition's Critical Mass today!

name: Animal Test 21ct
description:
Animal Test is the ultimate in legal hypertrophic, pro-testosterone supplementation. Combining the most potent natural extracts with one of the hottest, patented, proven supplements to hit the industry in recent years, the all new Animal Test redefines the capabilities of bodybuilding supplementation.

The Pro-Androgen portion of the Animal Test formula couples dynamic herbal extracts designed to facilitate a rise in free and total testosterone with effective anti-estrogen compounds capable of maximizing the natural anabolic response. Translation? Explosive gains in strength and size. This complex includes the revered free test potentiator 3,4- divanillyl tetrahydrofuran with anabolic ketosterones extracted from Cissus Quadrangularis—another exciting bodybuilding ingredient. This is only the first facet of the powerful Test formula.

The final and perhaps the most dramatically powerful element of the new Animal Test formula is the inclusion of the highly heralded, proven and patented hypertrophic agent, Arachidonic Acid (AA). Backed by university research studies and real world testimonials, AA has taken the bodybuilding world by storm—and for good reason. Arachidonic Acid has multiple benefits for the hard training bodybuilder, the most dramatic of which are the ability for it to enhance androgen receptor sensitivity and to amplify training related muscle inflammation and in turn magnify hypertrophy. This status as an anabolic catalyst made it the perfect backbone for this new Animal formula—providing muscle building qualities by itself and augmenting the actions of the other extremely powerful ingredients that together comprise Animal Test.

In addition to a full daily dose of creatine (patented and proven forms including MCC, CEE and TCM), you also get: (1) a fusion of a swelling NO Blast Complex; (2) a shocking Energy Rush Complex; (3) a special antioxidant blend needed for NO products; and (4) potent cell volumizers, all wrapped up in a special nutrient transport complex. name: Animal Omega 30ct
description:
EFAs are those necessary fats that we as humans are unable to synthesize in our bodies and must be obtained from either diet or supplementation. Just like essential amino acids (EAAs as found in Animal Nitro), and other essential micronutrients such as vitamins and minerals, we need optimum amounts in order for the body to function properly, let alone to make gains in lean mass. Getting the proper EFAs isn't always easy, especially when they are hard to obtain with a typical diet. A typical diet consists of an overabundance of saturated fats, trans fats, and those fats from plant sources (think of common cooking oils) usually overloaded with omega 6 compounds, as they are the easiest and most economical to get your hands on. Omega 6s are important, as they are EFAs too. But it's not just the types of fats. It's also the ratios. More on that later.

For supplementation purposes there are only 2 types of fats that are needed; Omega 3's (n-3) and Omega 6's (n-6). Omega 9 is necessary, yet not essential because it can be made by the body in modest amounts. The reason why the body can't make an n-3 or n-6 fatty acid is that human metabolism can't add a double bond to a fatty acid that is more than 9 carbons away from the delta end (acid end). This is also the reason why the body can't convert an n-3 fatty acid to an n-6 fatty acid. Yeah, it sounds like science mumbo jumbo, but is important to see from a chemistry perspective why it's so hard to obtain the right EFAs from the diet.

name: Animal Nitro
description:
Accelerated Amino Transport. Aminos are the basic building blocks of muscle. Aminos can also trigger anabolism, the cornerstone of muscle growth. As a lifter, you need them, especially the right ones. While there are nearly two dozen different amino acids, only a select few are absolutely essential for igniting the anabolic drive, as new research has shown. Not surprisingly, these required aminos are the same ones found in human muscle protein.

Animal Nitro is the first and only supplement that contains the correct ratios of those aminos based on human muscle protein itself. This complex of aminos is appropriately called Human Muscle Protein Complex (HMPC) and they’re only in Animal Nitro. HMPC consists of special “uncoupled” aminos exclusively – those that are free of the chemical bonds that can limit maximum utilization. By using only 100% uncoupled aminos in HMPC, Animal Nitro delivers a precisely controlled dose of aminos that are “targeted” to efficiently enter systemic circulation through a novel amino transport system. Here’s how it works. Each pack consists of a measured 6,000mg dose of uncoupled aminos (HMPC). Once ingested, they form a special bolus (a protective “mass”) that allows them to efficiently bypass the liver. Now this is vital as the liver captures and catabolizes regular amino acids (like those found in protein powders such as whey and more conventional amino supplements) to urea, a waste product. Once safely past the liver, this bolus of uncoupled aminos enters systemic circulation, where they can exert their powerful pharmacological actions–vasodilation and anabolism. When combined with resistance training, Animal Nitro can actually help your body deliver more nutrients to your working muscles, recover more quickly, and build new muscle mass by enhancing protein synthesis, improving net muscle protein balance, and preventing muscle breakdown.

Gram for gram, nothing is as pure, as efficient, as potent, and as effective as Animal Nitro. It’s the gold standard among amino-based supplements.

name: Animal Flex 44ct
description:
Your body's foundation is your joints, ligaments, tendons, and all the connective tissue - the necessary stuff that supports your muscles, your training. The harder you train, the more massive amounts of weight and the numerous sets and reps performed in a typical workout, the more stress you put on your foundation. This constant pounding can take its toll, weaken it. And when a foundation crumbles, the house comes tumbling down.

Animal Flex is designed to help strengthen your body's foundation, to help protect your joints from the daily grind brought about by heavy duty weight training. Each pack of Animal Flex consists of several key joint protection complexes: (1) a potent joint construction complex to help repair connection tissue; (2) a lubrication complex to help cushion the joints from lifting; (3) a support complex to help promote rehabilitation and reduce soreness; and (4) a key vitamin/mineral support blend to help underscore optimal joint health. Animal Flex is your armor against the rigors of iron warfare. It is complete, comprehensive and effective.

name: Animal PAK
description:
The #1 selling training pak in the world for twenty four years straight. Since 1984, more competitive bodybuilders have cut their teeth on the Animal Pak than any other bodybuilding supplement in history. Why? Simple. Animal Pak gets the job done. It works. First time. Last time. Every time.

Each of the 11 tablets included in each pak has been specifically formulated to deliver the goods. By taking the Animal Pak, you prevent the formation of nutritional gaps. Why should you care? The greater your training intensity, the faster and larger these gaps grow over time. When this happens you eventually hit a plateau. You stop growing. Maybe you’ve already hit this wall. To make matters worse, if you take other supplements, these same gaps begin to render those expensive supplements useless. Many of today’s supplements rely on enzymes and other substances in your body to “activate” them. Nutrititional gaps mean these key activators may not function at all, so you may be wasting all of your hard-earned money on supplements that won’t or can’t work.
